52struct named_statschannel {
53 /* Unlocked */
54 isc_httpdmgr_t *httpdmgr;
55 isc_sockaddr_t address;
56 isc_mem_t *mctx;
57
58 /*
59 * Locked by channel lock: can be referenced and modified by both
60 * the server task and the channel task.
61 */
62 isc_mutex_t lock;
63 dns_acl_t *acl;
64
65 /* Locked by server task */
66 ISC_LINK(struct named_statschannel) link;
67};
68
69typedef struct
70stats_dumparg {
71 isc_statsformat_t type;
72 void *arg; /* type dependent argument */
73 int ncounters; /* for general statistics */
74 int *counterindices; /* for general statistics */
75 uint64_t *countervalues; /* for general statistics */
76 isc_result_t result;
77} stats_dumparg_t;
78
79static isc_once_t once = ISC_ONCE_INIT;
80
81#if defined(HAVE_LIBXML2) || defined(HAVE_JSON)
82#define EXTENDED_STATS
83#else
84#undef EXTENDED_STATS
85#endif
86
87#ifdef EXTENDED_STATS
88static const char *
89user_zonetype( dns_zone_t *zone ) {
90 dns_zonetype_t ztype;
91 dns_view_t *view;
92 static const struct zt {
93 const dns_zonetype_t type;
94 const char *const string;
95 } typemap[] = {
96 { dns_zone_none, "none" },
97 { dns_zone_master, "master" },
98 { dns_zone_slave, "slave" },
99 { dns_zone_mirror, "mirror" },
100 { dns_zone_stub, "stub" },
101 { dns_zone_staticstub, "static-stub" },
102 { dns_zone_key, "key" },
103 { dns_zone_dlz, "dlz" },
104 { dns_zone_redirect, "redirect" },
105 { 0, NULL }
106 };
107 const struct zt *tp;
108
109 if ((dns_zone_getoptions(zone) & DNS_ZONEOPT_AUTOEMPTY) != 0)
110 return ("builtin");
111
112 view = dns_zone_getview(zone);
113 if (view != NULL && strcmp(view->name, "_bind") == 0)
114 return ("builtin");
115
116 ztype = dns_zone_gettype(zone);
117 for (tp = typemap; tp->string != NULL && tp->type != ztype; tp++)
118 /* empty */;
119 return (tp->string);
120}
121#endif
122
123/*%
124 * Statistics descriptions. These could be statistically initialized at
125 * compile time, but we configure them run time in the init_desc() function
126 * below so that they'll be less susceptible to counter name changes.
127 */
128static const char *nsstats_desc[ns_statscounter_max];
129static const char *resstats_desc[dns_resstatscounter_max];
130static const char *adbstats_desc[dns_adbstats_max];
131static const char *zonestats_desc[dns_zonestatscounter_max];
132static const char *sockstats_desc[isc_sockstatscounter_max];
133static const char *dnssecstats_desc[dns_dnssecstats_max];
134static const char *udpinsizestats_desc[dns_sizecounter_in_max];
135static const char *udpoutsizestats_desc[dns_sizecounter_out_max];
136static const char *tcpinsizestats_desc[dns_sizecounter_in_max];
137static const char *tcpoutsizestats_desc[dns_sizecounter_out_max];
138static const char *dnstapstats_desc[dns_dnstapcounter_max];
139static const char *gluecachestats_desc[dns_gluecachestatscounter_max];
140#if defined(EXTENDED_STATS)
141static const char *nsstats_xmldesc[ns_statscounter_max];
142static const char *resstats_xmldesc[dns_resstatscounter_max];
143static const char *adbstats_xmldesc[dns_adbstats_max];
144static const char *zonestats_xmldesc[dns_zonestatscounter_max];
145static const char *sockstats_xmldesc[isc_sockstatscounter_max];
146static const char *dnssecstats_xmldesc[dns_dnssecstats_max];
147static const char *udpinsizestats_xmldesc[dns_sizecounter_in_max];
148static const char *udpoutsizestats_xmldesc[dns_sizecounter_out_max];
149static const char *tcpinsizestats_xmldesc[dns_sizecounter_in_max];
150static const char *tcpoutsizestats_xmldesc[dns_sizecounter_out_max];
151static const char *dnstapstats_xmldesc[dns_dnstapcounter_max];
152static const char *gluecachestats_xmldesc[dns_gluecachestatscounter_max];
153#else
154#define nsstats_xmldesc NULL
155#define resstats_xmldesc NULL
156#define adbstats_xmldesc NULL
157#define zonestats_xmldesc NULL
158#define sockstats_xmldesc NULL
159#define dnssecstats_xmldesc NULL
160#define udpinsizestats_xmldesc NULL
161#define udpoutsizestats_xmldesc NULL
162#define tcpinsizestats_xmldesc NULL
163#define tcpoutsizestats_xmldesc NULL
164#define dnstapstats_xmldesc NULL
165#define gluecachestats_xmldesc NULL
166#endif /* EXTENDED_STATS */
167
168#define TRY0(a) do { xmlrc = (a); if (xmlrc < 0) goto error; } while(/*CONSTCOND*/0)
169
170/*%
171 * Mapping arrays to represent statistics counters in the order of our
172 * preference, regardless of the order of counter indices. For example,
173 * nsstats_desc[nsstats_index[0]] will be the description that is shown first.
174 */
175static int nsstats_index[ns_statscounter_max];
176static int resstats_index[dns_resstatscounter_max];
177static int adbstats_index[dns_adbstats_max];
178static int zonestats_index[dns_zonestatscounter_max];
179static int sockstats_index[isc_sockstatscounter_max];
180static int dnssecstats_index[dns_dnssecstats_max];
181static int udpinsizestats_index[dns_sizecounter_in_max];
182static int udpoutsizestats_index[dns_sizecounter_out_max];
183static int tcpinsizestats_index[dns_sizecounter_in_max];
184static int tcpoutsizestats_index[dns_sizecounter_out_max];
185static int dnstapstats_index[dns_dnstapcounter_max];
186static int gluecachestats_index[dns_gluecachestatscounter_max];
187
188static inline void
189set_desc(int counter, int maxcounter, const char *fdesc, const char **fdescs,
190 const char *xdesc, const char **xdescs)
191{
192 REQUIRE(counter < maxcounter);
193 REQUIRE(fdescs != NULL && fdescs[counter] == NULL);
194#if defined(EXTENDED_STATS)
195 REQUIRE(xdescs != NULL && xdescs[counter] == NULL);
196#endif
197
198 fdescs[counter] = fdesc;
199#if defined(EXTENDED_STATS)
200 xdescs[counter] = xdesc;
201#else
202 UNUSED(xdesc);
203 UNUSED(xdescs);
204#endif
205}
206
207static void
208init_desc(void) {
209 int i;
210
211 /* Initialize name server statistics */
212 for (i = 0; i < ns_statscounter_max; i++)
213 nsstats_desc[i] = NULL;
214#if defined(EXTENDED_STATS)
215 for (i = 0; i < ns_statscounter_max; i++)
216 nsstats_xmldesc[i] = NULL;
217#endif
218
219#define SET_NSSTATDESC(counterid, desc, xmldesc) \
220 do { \
221 set_desc(ns_statscounter_ ## counterid, \
222 ns_statscounter_max, \
223 desc, nsstats_desc, xmldesc, nsstats_xmldesc); \
224 nsstats_index[i++] = ns_statscounter_ ## counterid; \
225 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
226
227 i = 0;
228 SET_NSSTATDESC(requestv4, "IPv4 requests received", "Requestv4");
229 SET_NSSTATDESC(requestv6, "IPv6 requests received", "Requestv6");
230 SET_NSSTATDESC(edns0in, "requests with EDNS(0) received", "ReqEdns0");
231 SET_NSSTATDESC(badednsver,
232 "requests with unsupported EDNS version received",
233 "ReqBadEDNSVer");
234 SET_NSSTATDESC(tsigin, "requests with TSIG received", "ReqTSIG");
235 SET_NSSTATDESC(sig0in, "requests with SIG(0) received", "ReqSIG0");
236 SET_NSSTATDESC(invalidsig, "requests with invalid signature",
237 "ReqBadSIG");
238 SET_NSSTATDESC(requesttcp, "TCP requests received", "ReqTCP");
239 SET_NSSTATDESC(authrej, "auth queries rejected", "AuthQryRej");
240 SET_NSSTATDESC(recurserej, "recursive queries rejected", "RecQryRej");
241 SET_NSSTATDESC(xfrrej, "transfer requests rejected", "XfrRej");
242 SET_NSSTATDESC(updaterej, "update requests rejected", "UpdateRej");
243 SET_NSSTATDESC(response, "responses sent", "Response");
244 SET_NSSTATDESC(truncatedresp, "truncated responses sent",
245 "TruncatedResp");
246 SET_NSSTATDESC(edns0out, "responses with EDNS(0) sent", "RespEDNS0");
247 SET_NSSTATDESC(tsigout, "responses with TSIG sent", "RespTSIG");
248 SET_NSSTATDESC(sig0out, "responses with SIG(0) sent", "RespSIG0");
249 SET_NSSTATDESC(success, "queries resulted in successful answer",
250 "QrySuccess");
251 SET_NSSTATDESC(authans, "queries resulted in authoritative answer",
252 "QryAuthAns");
253 SET_NSSTATDESC(nonauthans,
254 "queries resulted in non authoritative answer",
255 "QryNoauthAns");
256 SET_NSSTATDESC(referral, "queries resulted in referral answer",
257 "QryReferral");
258 SET_NSSTATDESC(nxrrset, "queries resulted in nxrrset", "QryNxrrset");
259 SET_NSSTATDESC(servfail, "queries resulted in SERVFAIL", "QrySERVFAIL");
260 SET_NSSTATDESC(formerr, "queries resulted in FORMERR", "QryFORMERR");
261 SET_NSSTATDESC(nxdomain, "queries resulted in NXDOMAIN", "QryNXDOMAIN");
262 SET_NSSTATDESC(recursion, "queries caused recursion", "QryRecursion");
263 SET_NSSTATDESC(duplicate, "duplicate queries received", "QryDuplicate");
264 SET_NSSTATDESC(dropped, "queries dropped", "QryDropped");
265 SET_NSSTATDESC(failure, "other query failures", "QryFailure");
266 SET_NSSTATDESC(xfrdone, "requested transfers completed", "XfrReqDone");
267 SET_NSSTATDESC(updatereqfwd, "update requests forwarded",
268 "UpdateReqFwd");
269 SET_NSSTATDESC(updaterespfwd, "update responses forwarded",
270 "UpdateRespFwd");
271 SET_NSSTATDESC(updatefwdfail, "update forward failed", "UpdateFwdFail");
272 SET_NSSTATDESC(updatedone, "updates completed", "UpdateDone");
273 SET_NSSTATDESC(updatefail, "updates failed", "UpdateFail");
274 SET_NSSTATDESC(updatebadprereq,
275 "updates rejected due to prerequisite failure",
276 "UpdateBadPrereq");
277 SET_NSSTATDESC(recursclients, "recursing clients",
278 "RecursClients");
279 SET_NSSTATDESC(dns64, "queries answered by DNS64", "DNS64");
280 SET_NSSTATDESC(ratedropped, "responses dropped for rate limits",
281 "RateDropped");
282 SET_NSSTATDESC(rateslipped, "responses truncated for rate limits",
283 "RateSlipped");
284 SET_NSSTATDESC(rpz_rewrites, "response policy zone rewrites",
285 "RPZRewrites");
286 SET_NSSTATDESC(udp, "UDP queries received", "QryUDP");
287 SET_NSSTATDESC(tcp, "TCP queries received", "QryTCP");
288 SET_NSSTATDESC(nsidopt, "NSID option received", "NSIDOpt");
289 SET_NSSTATDESC(expireopt, "Expire option received", "ExpireOpt");
290 SET_NSSTATDESC(keepaliveopt, "EDNS TCP keepalive option received",
291 "KeepAliveOpt");
292 SET_NSSTATDESC(padopt, "EDNS padding option received", "PadOpt");
293 SET_NSSTATDESC(otheropt, "Other EDNS option received", "OtherOpt");
294 SET_NSSTATDESC(cookiein, "COOKIE option received", "CookieIn");
295 SET_NSSTATDESC(cookienew, "COOKIE - client only", "CookieNew");
296 SET_NSSTATDESC(cookiebadsize, "COOKIE - bad size", "CookieBadSize");
297 SET_NSSTATDESC(cookiebadtime, "COOKIE - bad time", "CookieBadTime");
298 SET_NSSTATDESC(cookienomatch, "COOKIE - no match", "CookieNoMatch");
299 SET_NSSTATDESC(cookiematch, "COOKIE - match", "CookieMatch");
300 SET_NSSTATDESC(ecsopt, "EDNS client subnet option received", "ECSOpt");
301 SET_NSSTATDESC(nxdomainredirect,
302 "queries resulted in NXDOMAIN that were redirected",
303 "QryNXRedir");
304 SET_NSSTATDESC(nxdomainredirect_rlookup,
305 "queries resulted in NXDOMAIN that were redirected and "
306 "resulted in a successful remote lookup",
307 "QryNXRedirRLookup");
308 SET_NSSTATDESC(badcookie, "sent badcookie response", "QryBADCOOKIE");
309 SET_NSSTATDESC(nxdomainsynth, "synthesized a NXDOMAIN response", "SynthNXDOMAIN");
310 SET_NSSTATDESC(nodatasynth, "syththesized a no-data response", "SynthNODATA");
311 SET_NSSTATDESC(wildcardsynth, "synthesized a wildcard response", "SynthWILDCARD");
312 SET_NSSTATDESC(trystale,
313 "attempts to use stale cache data after lookup failure",
314 "QryTryStale");
315 SET_NSSTATDESC(usedstale,
316 "successful uses of stale cache data after lookup failure",
317 "QryUsedStale");
318 SET_NSSTATDESC(prefetch, "queries triggered prefetch", "Prefetch");
319 SET_NSSTATDESC(keytagopt, "Keytag option received", "KeyTagOpt");
320 INSIST(i == ns_statscounter_max);
321
322 /* Initialize resolver statistics */
323 for (i = 0; i < dns_resstatscounter_max; i++)
324 resstats_desc[i] = NULL;
325#if defined(EXTENDED_STATS)
326 for (i = 0; i < dns_resstatscounter_max; i++)
327 resstats_xmldesc[i] = NULL;
328#endif
329
330#define SET_RESSTATDESC(counterid, desc, xmldesc) \
331 do { \
332 set_desc(dns_resstatscounter_ ## counterid, \
333 dns_resstatscounter_max, \
334 desc, resstats_desc, xmldesc, resstats_xmldesc); \
335 resstats_index[i++] = dns_resstatscounter_ ## counterid; \
336 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
337
338 i = 0;
339 SET_RESSTATDESC(queryv4, "IPv4 queries sent", "Queryv4");
340 SET_RESSTATDESC(queryv6, "IPv6 queries sent", "Queryv6");
341 SET_RESSTATDESC(responsev4, "IPv4 responses received", "Responsev4");
342 SET_RESSTATDESC(responsev6, "IPv6 responses received", "Responsev6");
343 SET_RESSTATDESC(nxdomain, "NXDOMAIN received", "NXDOMAIN");
344 SET_RESSTATDESC(servfail, "SERVFAIL received", "SERVFAIL");
345 SET_RESSTATDESC(formerr, "FORMERR received", "FORMERR");
346 SET_RESSTATDESC(othererror, "other errors received", "OtherError");
347 SET_RESSTATDESC(edns0fail, "EDNS(0) query failures", "EDNS0Fail");
348 SET_RESSTATDESC(mismatch, "mismatch responses received", "Mismatch");
349 SET_RESSTATDESC(truncated, "truncated responses received", "Truncated");
350 SET_RESSTATDESC(lame, "lame delegations received", "Lame");
351 SET_RESSTATDESC(retry, "query retries", "Retry");
352 SET_RESSTATDESC(dispabort, "queries aborted due to quota",
353 "QueryAbort");
354 SET_RESSTATDESC(dispsockfail, "failures in opening query sockets",
355 "QuerySockFail");
356 SET_RESSTATDESC(disprequdp, "UDP queries in progress", "QueryCurUDP");
357 SET_RESSTATDESC(dispreqtcp, "TCP queries in progress", "QueryCurTCP");
358 SET_RESSTATDESC(querytimeout, "query timeouts", "QueryTimeout");
359 SET_RESSTATDESC(gluefetchv4, "IPv4 NS address fetches", "GlueFetchv4");
360 SET_RESSTATDESC(gluefetchv6, "IPv6 NS address fetches", "GlueFetchv6");
361 SET_RESSTATDESC(gluefetchv4fail, "IPv4 NS address fetch failed",
362 "GlueFetchv4Fail");
363 SET_RESSTATDESC(gluefetchv6fail, "IPv6 NS address fetch failed",
364 "GlueFetchv6Fail");
365 SET_RESSTATDESC(val, "DNSSEC validation attempted", "ValAttempt");
366 SET_RESSTATDESC(valsuccess, "DNSSEC validation succeeded", "ValOk");
367 SET_RESSTATDESC(valnegsuccess, "DNSSEC NX validation succeeded",
368 "ValNegOk");
369 SET_RESSTATDESC(valfail, "DNSSEC validation failed", "ValFail");
370 SET_RESSTATDESC(queryrtt0, "queries with RTT < "
371 DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS0STR "ms",
372 "QryRTT" DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS0STR);
373 SET_RESSTATDESC(queryrtt1, "queries with RTT "
374 DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS0STR "-"
375 DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS1STR "ms",
376 "QryRTT" DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS1STR);
377 SET_RESSTATDESC(queryrtt2, "queries with RTT "
378 DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS1STR "-"
379 DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS2STR "ms",
380 "QryRTT" DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS2STR);
381 SET_RESSTATDESC(queryrtt3, "queries with RTT "
382 DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS2STR "-"
383 DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS3STR "ms",
384 "QryRTT" DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS3STR);
385 SET_RESSTATDESC(queryrtt4, "queries with RTT "
386 DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS3STR "-"
387 DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS4STR "ms",
388 "QryRTT" DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS4STR);
389 SET_RESSTATDESC(queryrtt5, "queries with RTT > "
390 DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS4STR "ms",
391 "QryRTT" DNS_RESOLVER_QRYRTTCLASS4STR "+");
392 SET_RESSTATDESC(nfetch, "active fetches", "NumFetch");
393 SET_RESSTATDESC(buckets, "bucket size", "BucketSize");
394 SET_RESSTATDESC(refused, "REFUSED received", "REFUSED");
395 SET_RESSTATDESC(cookienew, "COOKIE send with client cookie only",
396 "ClientCookieOut");
397 SET_RESSTATDESC(cookieout, "COOKIE sent with client and server cookie",
398 "ServerCookieOut");
399 SET_RESSTATDESC(cookiein, "COOKIE replies received", "CookieIn");
400 SET_RESSTATDESC(cookieok, "COOKIE client ok", "CookieClientOk");
401 SET_RESSTATDESC(badvers, "bad EDNS version", "BadEDNSVersion");
402 SET_RESSTATDESC(badcookie, "bad cookie rcode", "BadCookieRcode");
403 SET_RESSTATDESC(zonequota, "spilled due to zone quota", "ZoneQuota");
404 SET_RESSTATDESC(serverquota, "spilled due to server quota",
405 "ServerQuota");
406 SET_RESSTATDESC(nextitem, "waited for next item", "NextItem");
407 SET_RESSTATDESC(priming, "priming queries", "Priming");
408
409 INSIST(i == dns_resstatscounter_max);
410
411 /* Initialize adb statistics */
412 for (i = 0; i < dns_adbstats_max; i++)
413 adbstats_desc[i] = NULL;
414#if defined(EXTENDED_STATS)
415 for (i = 0; i < dns_adbstats_max; i++)
416 adbstats_xmldesc[i] = NULL;
417#endif
418
419#define SET_ADBSTATDESC(id, desc, xmldesc) \
420 do { \
421 set_desc(dns_adbstats_ ## id, dns_adbstats_max, \
422 desc, adbstats_desc, xmldesc, adbstats_xmldesc); \
423 adbstats_index[i++] = dns_adbstats_ ## id; \
424 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
425 i = 0;
426 SET_ADBSTATDESC(nentries, "Address hash table size", "nentries");
427 SET_ADBSTATDESC(entriescnt, "Addresses in hash table", "entriescnt");
428 SET_ADBSTATDESC(nnames, "Name hash table size", "nnames");
429 SET_ADBSTATDESC(namescnt, "Names in hash table", "namescnt");
430
431 INSIST(i == dns_adbstats_max);
432
433 /* Initialize zone statistics */
434 for (i = 0; i < dns_zonestatscounter_max; i++)
435 zonestats_desc[i] = NULL;
436#if defined(EXTENDED_STATS)
437 for (i = 0; i < dns_zonestatscounter_max; i++)
438 zonestats_xmldesc[i] = NULL;
439#endif
440
441#define SET_ZONESTATDESC(counterid, desc, xmldesc) \
442 do { \
443 set_desc(dns_zonestatscounter_ ## counterid, \
444 dns_zonestatscounter_max, \
445 desc, zonestats_desc, xmldesc, zonestats_xmldesc); \
446 zonestats_index[i++] = dns_zonestatscounter_ ## counterid; \
447 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
448
449 i = 0;
450 SET_ZONESTATDESC(notifyoutv4, "IPv4 notifies sent", "NotifyOutv4");
451 SET_ZONESTATDESC(notifyoutv6, "IPv6 notifies sent", "NotifyOutv6");
452 SET_ZONESTATDESC(notifyinv4, "IPv4 notifies received", "NotifyInv4");
453 SET_ZONESTATDESC(notifyinv6, "IPv6 notifies received", "NotifyInv6");
454 SET_ZONESTATDESC(notifyrej, "notifies rejected", "NotifyRej");
455 SET_ZONESTATDESC(soaoutv4, "IPv4 SOA queries sent", "SOAOutv4");
456 SET_ZONESTATDESC(soaoutv6, "IPv6 SOA queries sent", "SOAOutv6");
457 SET_ZONESTATDESC(axfrreqv4, "IPv4 AXFR requested", "AXFRReqv4");
458 SET_ZONESTATDESC(axfrreqv6, "IPv6 AXFR requested", "AXFRReqv6");
459 SET_ZONESTATDESC(ixfrreqv4, "IPv4 IXFR requested", "IXFRReqv4");
460 SET_ZONESTATDESC(ixfrreqv6, "IPv6 IXFR requested", "IXFRReqv6");
461 SET_ZONESTATDESC(xfrsuccess, "transfer requests succeeded",
462 "XfrSuccess");
463 SET_ZONESTATDESC(xfrfail, "transfer requests failed", "XfrFail");
464 INSIST(i == dns_zonestatscounter_max);
465
466 /* Initialize socket statistics */
467 for (i = 0; i < isc_sockstatscounter_max; i++)
468 sockstats_desc[i] = NULL;
469#if defined(EXTENDED_STATS)
470 for (i = 0; i < isc_sockstatscounter_max; i++)
471 sockstats_xmldesc[i] = NULL;
472#endif
473
474#define SET_SOCKSTATDESC(counterid, desc, xmldesc) \
475 do { \
476 set_desc(isc_sockstatscounter_ ## counterid, \
477 isc_sockstatscounter_max, \
478 desc, sockstats_desc, xmldesc, sockstats_xmldesc); \
479 sockstats_index[i++] = isc_sockstatscounter_ ## counterid; \
480 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
481
482 i = 0;
483 SET_SOCKSTATDESC(udp4open, "UDP/IPv4 sockets opened", "UDP4Open");
484 SET_SOCKSTATDESC(udp6open, "UDP/IPv6 sockets opened", "UDP6Open");
485 SET_SOCKSTATDESC(tcp4open, "TCP/IPv4 sockets opened", "TCP4Open");
486 SET_SOCKSTATDESC(tcp6open, "TCP/IPv6 sockets opened", "TCP6Open");
487 SET_SOCKSTATDESC(unixopen, "Unix domain sockets opened", "UnixOpen");
488 SET_SOCKSTATDESC(rawopen, "Raw sockets opened", "RawOpen");
489 SET_SOCKSTATDESC(udp4openfail, "UDP/IPv4 socket open failures",
490 "UDP4OpenFail");
491 SET_SOCKSTATDESC(udp6openfail, "UDP/IPv6 socket open failures",
492 "UDP6OpenFail");
493 SET_SOCKSTATDESC(tcp4openfail, "TCP/IPv4 socket open failures",
494 "TCP4OpenFail");
495 SET_SOCKSTATDESC(tcp6openfail, "TCP/IPv6 socket open failures",
496 "TCP6OpenFail");

585 /* Initialize DNSSEC statistics */
586 for (i = 0; i < dns_dnssecstats_max; i++)
587 dnssecstats_desc[i] = NULL;
588#if defined(EXTENDED_STATS)

593#define SET_DNSSECSTATDESC(counterid, desc, xmldesc) \
594 do { \
595 set_desc(dns_dnssecstats_ ## counterid, \
596 dns_dnssecstats_max, \
597 desc, dnssecstats_desc, \
598 xmldesc, dnssecstats_xmldesc); \
599 dnssecstats_index[i++] = dns_dnssecstats_ ## counterid; \
600 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
601
602 i = 0;
603 SET_DNSSECSTATDESC(asis, "dnssec validation success with signer "
604 "\"as is\"", "DNSSECasis");
605 SET_DNSSECSTATDESC(downcase, "dnssec validation success with signer "
606 "lower cased", "DNSSECdowncase");
607 SET_DNSSECSTATDESC(wildcard, "dnssec validation of wildcard signature",
608 "DNSSECwild");
609 SET_DNSSECSTATDESC(fail, "dnssec validation failures", "DNSSECfail");
610 INSIST(i == dns_dnssecstats_max);

615#if defined(EXTENDED_STATS)
616 for (i = 0; i < dns_dnstapcounter_max; i++)
617 dnstapstats_xmldesc[i] = NULL;
618#endif

620#define SET_DNSTAPSTATDESC(counterid, desc, xmldesc) \

624 desc, dnstapstats_desc, \
625 xmldesc, dnstapstats_xmldesc); \
626 dnstapstats_index[i++] = dns_dnstapcounter_ ## counterid; \
627 } while (0)
628 i = 0;

658 for (i = 0; i < ns_statscounter_max; i++)
659 INSIST(nsstats_desc[i] != NULL);
660 for (i = 0; i < dns_resstatscounter_max; i++)
661 INSIST(resstats_desc[i] != NULL);

667 INSIST(sockstats_desc[i] != NULL);

669 INSIST(dnssecstats_desc[i] != NULL);

671 INSIST(dnstapstats_desc[i] != NULL);
672 for (i = 0; i < dns_gluecachestatscounter_max; i++)
673 INSIST(gluecachestats_desc[i] != NULL);

677 for (i = 0; i < dns_resstatscounter_max; i++)

711#define SET_SIZESTATDESC(counterid, desc, xmldesc, inout) \

718 dns_sizecounter_ ## inout ## _max, \
719 desc, tcp ## inout ## sizestats_desc, \
720 xmldesc, tcp ## inout ## sizestats_xmldesc); \
721 udp ## inout ## sizestats_index[i] = dns_sizecounter_ ## inout ## _ ## counterid; \
722 tcp ## inout ## sizestats_index[i] = dns_sizecounter_ ## inout ## _ ## counterid; \
723 i++; \
724 } while (0)

986 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3792, "responses sent 3792-3807 bytes", "3792-3807", out);
987 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3808, "responses sent 3808-3823 bytes", "3808-3823", out);
988 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3824, "responses sent 3824-3839 bytes", "3824-3839", out);
989 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3840, "responses sent 3840-3855 bytes", "3840-3855", out);
990 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3856, "responses sent 3856-3871 bytes", "3856-3871", out);
991 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3872, "responses sent 3872-3887 bytes", "3872-3887", out);
992 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3888, "responses sent 3888-3903 bytes", "3888-3903", out);
993 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3904, "responses sent 3904-3919 bytes", "3904-3919", out);
994 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3920, "responses sent 3920-3935 bytes", "3920-3935", out);
995 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3936, "responses sent 3936-3951 bytes", "3936-3951", out);
996 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3952, "responses sent 3952-3967 bytes", "3952-3967", out);
997 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3968, "responses sent 3968-3983 bytes", "3968-3983", out);
998 SET_SIZESTATDESC(3984, "responses sent 3984-3999 bytes", "3984-3999", out);
999 SET_SIZESTATDESC(4000, "responses sent 4000-4015 bytes", "4000-4015", out);
1000 SET_SIZESTATDESC(4016, "responses sent 4016-4031 bytes", "4016-4031", out);
1001 SET_SIZESTATDESC(4032, "responses sent 4032-4047 bytes", "4032-4047", out);
1002 SET_SIZESTATDESC(4048, "responses sent 4048-4063 bytes", "4048-4063", out);
1003 SET_SIZESTATDESC(4064, "responses sent 4064-4079 bytes", "4064-4079", out);
1004 SET_SIZESTATDESC(4080, "responses sent 4080-4095 bytes", "4080-4095", out);
1005 SET_SIZESTATDESC(4096, "responses sent 4096+ bytes", "4096+", out);
1006 INSIST(i == dns_sizecounter_out_max);
1007
1008 /* Sanity check */
1009 for (i = 0; i < ns_statscounter_max; i++)
1010 INSIST(nsstats_desc[i] != NULL);
1011 for (i = 0; i < dns_resstatscounter_max; i++)
1012 INSIST(resstats_desc[i] != NULL);
1013 for (i = 0; i < dns_adbstats_max; i++)
1014 INSIST(adbstats_desc[i] != NULL);
1015 for (i = 0; i < dns_zonestatscounter_max; i++)
1016 INSIST(zonestats_desc[i] != NULL);
1017 for (i = 0; i < isc_sockstatscounter_max; i++)
1018 INSIST(sockstats_desc[i] != NULL);
1019 for (i = 0; i < dns_dnssecstats_max; i++)
1020 INSIST(dnssecstats_desc[i] != NULL);
1021 for (i = 0; i < dns_sizecounter_in_max; i++) {
1022 INSIST(udpinsizestats_desc[i] != NULL);
1023 INSIST(tcpinsizestats_desc[i] != NULL);
1024 }
1025 for (i = 0; i < dns_sizecounter_out_max; i++) {
1026 INSIST(udpoutsizestats_desc[i] != NULL);
1027 INSIST(tcpoutsizestats_desc[i] != NULL);
1028 }
1029#if defined(EXTENDED_STATS)
1030 for (i = 0; i < ns_statscounter_max; i++)
1031 INSIST(nsstats_xmldesc[i] != NULL);
1032 for (i = 0; i < dns_resstatscounter_max; i++)
1033 INSIST(resstats_xmldesc[i] != NULL);
1034 for (i = 0; i < dns_adbstats_max; i++)
1035 INSIST(adbstats_xmldesc[i] != NULL);
1036 for (i = 0; i < dns_zonestatscounter_max; i++)
1037 INSIST(zonestats_xmldesc[i] != NULL);
1038 for (i = 0; i < isc_sockstatscounter_max; i++)
1039 INSIST(sockstats_xmldesc[i] != NULL);
1040 for (i = 0; i < dns_dnssecstats_max; i++)
1041 INSIST(dnssecstats_xmldesc[i] != NULL);
1042 for (i = 0; i < dns_sizecounter_in_max; i++) {
1043 INSIST(udpinsizestats_xmldesc[i] != NULL);
1044 INSIST(tcpinsizestats_xmldesc[i] != NULL);
1045 }
1046 for (i = 0; i < dns_sizecounter_out_max; i++) {
1047 INSIST(udpoutsizestats_xmldesc[i] != NULL);
1048 INSIST(tcpoutsizestats_xmldesc[i] != NULL);
1049 }
1050#endif
1051}
1052
1053/*%
1054 * Dump callback functions.
1055 */
1056static void
1057generalstat_dump(isc_statscounter_t counter, uint64_t val, void *arg) {
1058 stats_dumparg_t *dumparg = arg;
1059
1060 REQUIRE(counter < dumparg->ncounters);
1061 dumparg->countervalues[counter] = val;
1062}
1063
1064static isc_result_t
1065dump_counters(isc_stats_t *stats, isc_statsformat_t type, void *arg,
1066 const char *category, const char **desc, int ncounters,
1067 int *indices, uint64_t *values, int options)
1068{
1069 int i, idx;
1070 uint64_t value;
1071 stats_dumparg_t dumparg;
1072 FILE *fp;
1073#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1074 xmlTextWriterPtr writer;
1075 int xmlrc;
1076#endif
1077#ifdef HAVE_JSON
1078 json_object *job, *cat, *counter;
1079#endif
1080
1081#if !defined(EXTENDED_STATS)
1082 UNUSED(category);
1083#endif
1084
1085 dumparg.type = type;
1086 dumparg.ncounters = ncounters;
1087 dumparg.counterindices = indices;
1088 dumparg.countervalues = values;
1089
1090 memset(values, 0, sizeof(values[0]) * ncounters);
1091 isc_stats_dump(stats, generalstat_dump, &dumparg, options);
1092
1093#ifdef HAVE_JSON
1094 cat = job = (json_object *) arg;
1095 if (ncounters > 0 && type == isc_statsformat_json) {
1096 if (category != NULL) {
1097 cat = json_object_new_object();
1098 if (cat == NULL)
1099 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
1100 json_object_object_add(job, category, cat);
1101 }
1102 }
1103#endif
1104
1105 for (i = 0; i < ncounters; i++) {
1106 idx = indices[i];
1107 value = values[idx];
1108
1109 if (value == 0 && (options & ISC_STATSDUMP_VERBOSE) == 0)
1110 continue;
1111
1112 switch (dumparg.type) {
1113 case isc_statsformat_file:
1114 fp = arg;
1115 fprintf(fp, "%20" PRIu64 " %s\n",
1116 value, desc[idx]);
1117 break;
1118 case isc_statsformat_xml:
1119#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1120 writer = (xmlTextWriterPtr) arg;
1121
1122 if (category != NULL) {
1123 /* <NameOfCategory> */
1124 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer,
1125 ISC_XMLCHAR
1126 category));
1127
1128 /* <name> inside category */
1129 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer,
1130 ISC_XMLCHAR
1131 "name"));
1132 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteString(writer,
1133 ISC_XMLCHAR
1134 desc[idx]));
1135 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer));
1136 /* </name> */
1137
1138 /* <counter> */
1139 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer,
1140 ISC_XMLCHAR
1141 "counter"));
1142 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString(writer,
1143 "%" PRIu64, value));
1144
1145 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer));
1146 /* </counter> */
1147 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer));
1148 /* </NameOfCategory> */
1149
1150 } else {
1151 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer,
1152 ISC_XMLCHAR
1153 "counter"));
1154 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer,
1155 ISC_XMLCHAR
1156 "name",
1157 ISC_XMLCHAR
1158 desc[idx]));
1159 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString(writer,
1160 "%" PRIu64, value));
1161 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer));
1162 /* counter */
1163 }
1164
1165#endif
1166 break;
1167 case isc_statsformat_json:
1168#ifdef HAVE_JSON
1169 counter = json_object_new_int64(value);
1170 if (counter == NULL)
1171 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
1172 json_object_object_add(cat, desc[idx], counter);
1173#endif
1174 break;
1175 }
1176 }
1177 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1178#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1179 error:
1180 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
1181 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
1182 "failed at dump_counters()");
1183 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
1184#endif
1185}
1186
1187static void
1188rdtypestat_dump(dns_rdatastatstype_t type, uint64_t val, void *arg) {
1189 char typebuf[64];
1190 const char *typestr;
1191 stats_dumparg_t *dumparg = arg;
1192 FILE *fp;
1193#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1194 xmlTextWriterPtr writer;
1195 int xmlrc;
1196#endif
1197#ifdef HAVE_JSON
1198 json_object *zoneobj, *obj;
1199#endif
1200
1201 if ((DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR(type) & DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_OTHERTYPE)
1202 == 0) {
1203 dns_rdatatype_format(DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_BASE(type), typebuf,
1204 sizeof(typebuf));
1205 typestr = typebuf;
1206 } else
1207 typestr = "Others";
1208
1209 switch (dumparg->type) {
1210 case isc_statsformat_file:
1211 fp = dumparg->arg;
1212 fprintf(fp, "%20" PRIu64 " %s\n", val, typestr);
1213 break;
1214 case isc_statsformat_xml:
1215#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1216 writer = dumparg->arg;
1217
1218
1219 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counter"));
1220 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "name",
1221 ISC_XMLCHAR typestr));
1222
1223 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString(writer,
1224 "%" PRIu64,
1225 val));
1226
1227 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* type */
1228#endif
1229 break;
1230 case isc_statsformat_json:
1231#ifdef HAVE_JSON
1232 zoneobj = (json_object *) dumparg->arg;
1233 obj = json_object_new_int64(val);
1234 if (obj == NULL)
1235 return;
1236 json_object_object_add(zoneobj, typestr, obj);
1237#endif
1238 break;
1239 }
1240 return;
1241#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1242 error:
1243 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
1244 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
1245 "failed at rdtypestat_dump()");
1246 dumparg->result = ISC_R_FAILURE;
1247 return;
1248#endif
1249}
1250
1251static void
1252rdatasetstats_dump(dns_rdatastatstype_t type, uint64_t val, void *arg) {
1253 stats_dumparg_t *dumparg = arg;
1254 FILE *fp;
1255 char typebuf[64];
1256 const char *typestr;
1257 bool nxrrset = false;
1258 bool stale = false;
1259#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1260 xmlTextWriterPtr writer;
1261 int xmlrc;
1262#endif
1263#ifdef HAVE_JSON
1264 json_object *zoneobj, *obj;
1265 char buf[1024];
1266#endif
1267
1268 if ((DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR(type) & DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_NXDOMAIN)
1269 != 0) {
1270 typestr = "NXDOMAIN";
1271 } else if ((DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR(type) &
1272 DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_OTHERTYPE) != 0) {
1273 typestr = "Others";
1274 } else {
1275 dns_rdatatype_format(DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_BASE(type), typebuf,
1276 sizeof(typebuf));
1277 typestr = typebuf;
1278 }
1279
1280 if ((DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR(type) & DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_NXRRSET)
1281 != 0)
1282 nxrrset = true;
1283
1284 if ((DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR(type) & DNS_RDATASTATSTYPE_ATTR_STALE)
1285 != 0)
1286 stale = true;
1287
1288 switch (dumparg->type) {
1289 case isc_statsformat_file:
1290 fp = dumparg->arg;
1291 fprintf(fp, "%20" PRIu64 " %s%s%s\n", val,
1292 stale ? "#" : "", nxrrset ? "!" : "", typestr);
1293 break;
1294 case isc_statsformat_xml:
1295#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1296 writer = dumparg->arg;
1297
1298 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "rrset"));
1299 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "name"));
1300 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString(writer, "%s%s%s",
1301 stale ? "#" : "",
1302 nxrrset ? "!" : "", typestr));
1303 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* name */
1304
1305 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counter"));
1306 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString(writer,
1307 "%" PRIu64,
1308 val));
1309 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* counter */
1310
1311 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* rrset */
1312#endif
1313 break;
1314 case isc_statsformat_json:
1315#ifdef HAVE_JSON
1316 zoneobj = (json_object *) dumparg->arg;
1317 snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), "%s%s%s",
1318 stale ? "#" : "", nxrrset ? "!" : "", typestr);
1319 obj = json_object_new_int64(val);
1320 if (obj == NULL)
1321 return;
1322 json_object_object_add(zoneobj, buf, obj);
1323#endif
1324 break;
1325 }
1326 return;
1327#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1328 error:
1329 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
1330 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
1331 "failed at rdatasetstats_dump()");
1332 dumparg->result = ISC_R_FAILURE;
1333#endif
1334
1335}
1336
1337static void
1338opcodestat_dump(dns_opcode_t code, uint64_t val, void *arg) {
1339 FILE *fp;
1340 isc_buffer_t b;
1341 char codebuf[64];
1342 stats_dumparg_t *dumparg = arg;
1343#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1344 xmlTextWriterPtr writer;
1345 int xmlrc;
1346#endif
1347#ifdef HAVE_JSON
1348 json_object *zoneobj, *obj;
1349#endif
1350
1351 isc_buffer_init(&b, codebuf, sizeof(codebuf) - 1);
1352 dns_opcode_totext(code, &b);
1353 codebuf[isc_buffer_usedlength(&b)] = '\0';
1354
1355 switch (dumparg->type) {
1356 case isc_statsformat_file:
1357 fp = dumparg->arg;
1358 fprintf(fp, "%20" PRIu64 " %s\n", val, codebuf);
1359 break;
1360 case isc_statsformat_xml:
1361#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1362 writer = dumparg->arg;
1363 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counter"));
1364 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "name",
1365 ISC_XMLCHAR codebuf ));
1366 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString(writer,
1367 "%" PRIu64,
1368 val));
1369 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* counter */
1370#endif
1371 break;
1372 case isc_statsformat_json:
1373#ifdef HAVE_JSON
1374 zoneobj = (json_object *) dumparg->arg;
1375 obj = json_object_new_int64(val);
1376 if (obj == NULL)
1377 return;
1378 json_object_object_add(zoneobj, codebuf, obj);
1379#endif
1380 break;
1381 }
1382 return;
1383
1384#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1385 error:
1386 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
1387 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
1388 "failed at opcodestat_dump()");
1389 dumparg->result = ISC_R_FAILURE;
1390 return;
1391#endif
1392}
1393
1394static void
1395rcodestat_dump(dns_rcode_t code, uint64_t val, void *arg) {
1396 FILE *fp;
1397 isc_buffer_t b;
1398 char codebuf[64];
1399 stats_dumparg_t *dumparg = arg;
1400#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1401 xmlTextWriterPtr writer;
1402 int xmlrc;
1403#endif
1404#ifdef HAVE_JSON
1405 json_object *zoneobj, *obj;
1406#endif
1407
1408 isc_buffer_init(&b, codebuf, sizeof(codebuf) - 1);
1409 dns_rcode_totext(code, &b);
1410 codebuf[isc_buffer_usedlength(&b)] = '\0';
1411
1412 switch (dumparg->type) {
1413 case isc_statsformat_file:
1414 fp = dumparg->arg;
1415 fprintf(fp, "%20" PRIu64 " %s\n", val, codebuf);
1416 break;
1417 case isc_statsformat_xml:
1418#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1419 writer = dumparg->arg;
1420 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counter"));
1421 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "name",
1422 ISC_XMLCHAR codebuf ));
1423 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString(writer,
1424 "%" PRIu64,
1425 val));
1426 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* counter */
1427#endif
1428 break;
1429 case isc_statsformat_json:
1430#ifdef HAVE_JSON
1431 zoneobj = (json_object *) dumparg->arg;
1432 obj = json_object_new_int64(val);
1433 if (obj == NULL)
1434 return;
1435 json_object_object_add(zoneobj, codebuf, obj);
1436#endif
1437 break;
1438 }
1439 return;
1440
1441#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1442 error:
1443 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
1444 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
1445 "failed at rcodestat_dump()");
1446 dumparg->result = ISC_R_FAILURE;
1447 return;
1448#endif
1449}
1450
1451#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
1452/*
1453 * Which statistics to include when rendering to XML
1454 */
1455#define STATS_XML_STATUS 0x00 /* display only common statistics */
1456#define STATS_XML_SERVER 0x01
1457#define STATS_XML_ZONES 0x02
1458#define STATS_XML_TASKS 0x04
1459#define STATS_XML_NET 0x08
1460#define STATS_XML_MEM 0x10
1461#define STATS_XML_TRAFFIC 0x20
1462#define STATS_XML_ALL 0xff
1463
1464static isc_result_t
1465zone_xmlrender(dns_zone_t *zone, void *arg) {
1466 isc_result_t result;
1467 char buf[1024 + 32]; /* sufficiently large for zone name and class */
1468 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass;
1469 uint32_t serial;
1470 xmlTextWriterPtr writer = arg;
1471 dns_zonestat_level_t statlevel;
1472 int xmlrc;
1473 stats_dumparg_t dumparg;
1474 const char *ztype;
1475
1476 statlevel = dns_zone_getstatlevel(zone);
1477 if (statlevel == dns_zonestat_none)
1478 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1479
1480 dumparg.type = isc_statsformat_xml;
1481 dumparg.arg = writer;
1482
1483 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "zone"));
1484
1485 dns_zone_nameonly(zone, buf, sizeof(buf));
1486 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "name",
1487 ISC_XMLCHAR buf));
1488
1489 rdclass = dns_zone_getclass(zone);
1490 dns_rdataclass_format(rdclass, buf, sizeof(buf));
1491 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "rdataclass",
1492 ISC_XMLCHAR buf));
1493
1494 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type"));
1495 ztype = user_zonetype(zone);
1496 if (ztype != NULL)
1497 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteString(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR ztype));
1498 else
1499 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteString(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "unknown"));
1500 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* type */
1501
1502 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "serial"));
1503 if (dns_zone_getserial(zone, &serial) == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1504 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString(writer, "%u", serial));
1505 else
1506 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteString(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "-"));
1507 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* serial */
1508
1509 if (statlevel == dns_zonestat_full) {
1510 isc_stats_t *zonestats;
1511 isc_stats_t *gluecachestats;
1512 dns_stats_t *rcvquerystats;
1513 uint64_t nsstat_values[ns_statscounter_max];
1514 uint64_t gluecachestats_values[dns_gluecachestatscounter_max];
1515
1516 zonestats = dns_zone_getrequeststats(zone);
1517 if (zonestats != NULL) {
1518 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer,
1519 ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1520 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer,
1521 ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1522 ISC_XMLCHAR "rcode"));
1523
1524 result = dump_counters(zonestats, isc_statsformat_xml,
1525 writer, NULL, nsstats_xmldesc,
1526 ns_statscounter_max,
1527 nsstats_index, nsstat_values,
1528 ISC_STATSDUMP_VERBOSE);
1529 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1530 goto error;
1531 /* counters type="rcode"*/
1532 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer));
1533 }
1534
1535 gluecachestats = dns_zone_getgluecachestats(zone);
1536 if (gluecachestats != NULL) {
1537 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer,
1538 ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1539 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer,
1540 ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1541 ISC_XMLCHAR "gluecache"));
1542
1543 result = dump_counters(gluecachestats,
1544 isc_statsformat_xml,
1545 writer, NULL,
1546 gluecachestats_xmldesc,
1547 dns_gluecachestatscounter_max,
1548 gluecachestats_index,
1549 gluecachestats_values,
1550 ISC_STATSDUMP_VERBOSE);
1551 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1552 goto error;
1553 /* counters type="rcode"*/
1554 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer));
1555 }
1556
1557 rcvquerystats = dns_zone_getrcvquerystats(zone);
1558 if (rcvquerystats != NULL) {
1559 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer,
1560 ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1561 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer,
1562 ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1563 ISC_XMLCHAR "qtype"));
1564
1565 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
1566 dns_rdatatypestats_dump(rcvquerystats, rdtypestat_dump,
1567 &dumparg, 0);
1568 if(dumparg.result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1569 goto error;
1570
1571 /* counters type="qtype"*/
1572 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer));
1573 }
1574 }
1575
1576 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* zone */
1577
1578 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1579 error:
1580 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
1581 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
1582 "Failed at zone_xmlrender()");
1583 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
1584}
1585
1586static isc_result_t
1587generatexml(named_server_t *server, uint32_t flags,
1588 int *buflen, xmlChar **buf)
1589{
1590 char boottime[sizeof "yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.sssZ"];
1591 char configtime[sizeof "yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.sssZ"];
1592 char nowstr[sizeof "yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.sssZ"];
1593 isc_time_t now;
1594 xmlTextWriterPtr writer = NULL;
1595 xmlDocPtr doc = NULL;
1596 int xmlrc;
1597 dns_view_t *view;
1598 stats_dumparg_t dumparg;
1599 dns_stats_t *cacherrstats;
1600 uint64_t nsstat_values[ns_statscounter_max];
1601 uint64_t resstat_values[dns_resstatscounter_max];
1602 uint64_t adbstat_values[dns_adbstats_max];
1603 uint64_t zonestat_values[dns_zonestatscounter_max];
1604 uint64_t sockstat_values[isc_sockstatscounter_max];
1605 uint64_t udpinsizestat_values[dns_sizecounter_in_max];
1606 uint64_t udpoutsizestat_values[dns_sizecounter_out_max];
1607 uint64_t tcpinsizestat_values[dns_sizecounter_in_max];
1608 uint64_t tcpoutsizestat_values[dns_sizecounter_out_max];
1609#ifdef HAVE_DNSTAP
1610 uint64_t dnstapstat_values[dns_dnstapcounter_max];
1611#endif
1612 isc_result_t result;
1613
1614 isc_time_now(&now);
1615 isc_time_formatISO8601ms(&named_g_boottime, boottime, sizeof boottime);
1616 isc_time_formatISO8601ms(&named_g_configtime, configtime,
1617 sizeof configtime);
1618 isc_time_formatISO8601ms(&now, nowstr, sizeof nowstr);
1619
1620 writer = xmlNewTextWriterDoc(&doc, 0);
1621 if (writer == NULL)
1622 goto error;
1623 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartDocument(writer, NULL, "UTF-8", NULL));
1624 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWritePI(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "xml-stylesheet",
1625 ISC_XMLCHAR "type=\"text/xsl\" href=\"/bind9.xsl\""));
1626 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "statistics"));
1627 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "version",
1628 ISC_XMLCHAR "3.11"));
1629
1630 /* Set common fields for statistics dump */
1631 dumparg.type = isc_statsformat_xml;
1632 dumparg.arg = writer;
1633
1634 /* Render server information */
1635 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "server"));
1636 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "boot-time"));
1637 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteString(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR boottime));
1638 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* boot-time */
1639 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "config-time"));
1640 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteString(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR configtime));
1641 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* config-time */
1642 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "current-time"));
1643 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteString(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR nowstr));
1644 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* current-time */
1645 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "version"));
1646 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteString(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR named_g_version));
1647 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* version */
1648
1649 if ((flags & STATS_XML_SERVER) != 0) {
1650 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
1651
1652 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1653 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1654 ISC_XMLCHAR "opcode"));
1655
1656 dns_opcodestats_dump(server->sctx->opcodestats,
1657 opcodestat_dump, &dumparg,
1658 ISC_STATSDUMP_VERBOSE);
1659 if (dumparg.result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1660 goto error;
1661
1662 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer));
1663
1664 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1665 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1666 ISC_XMLCHAR "rcode"));
1667
1668 dns_rcodestats_dump(server->sctx->rcodestats,
1669 rcodestat_dump, &dumparg,
1670 ISC_STATSDUMP_VERBOSE);
1671 if (dumparg.result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1672 goto error;
1673
1674 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer));
1675
1676 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1677 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1678 ISC_XMLCHAR "qtype"));
1679
1680 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
1681 dns_rdatatypestats_dump(server->sctx->rcvquerystats,
1682 rdtypestat_dump, &dumparg, 0);
1683 if (dumparg.result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1684 goto error;
1685 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* counters */
1686
1687 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1688 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1689 ISC_XMLCHAR "nsstat"));
1690
1691 result = dump_counters(ns_stats_get(server->sctx->nsstats),
1692 isc_statsformat_xml,
1693 writer, NULL, nsstats_xmldesc,
1694 ns_statscounter_max,
1695 nsstats_index, nsstat_values,
1696 ISC_STATSDUMP_VERBOSE);
1697 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1698 goto error;
1699
1700 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* /nsstat */
1701
1702 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1703 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1704 ISC_XMLCHAR "zonestat"));
1705
1706 result = dump_counters(server->zonestats, isc_statsformat_xml,
1707 writer, NULL, zonestats_xmldesc,
1708 dns_zonestatscounter_max,
1709 zonestats_index, zonestat_values,
1710 ISC_STATSDUMP_VERBOSE);
1711 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1712 goto error;
1713
1714 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* /zonestat */
1715
1716 /*
1717 * Most of the common resolver statistics entries are 0, so
1718 * we don't use the verbose dump here.
1719 */
1720 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1721 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1722 ISC_XMLCHAR "resstat"));
1723 result = dump_counters(server->resolverstats,
1724 isc_statsformat_xml, writer,
1725 NULL, resstats_xmldesc,
1726 dns_resstatscounter_max,
1727 resstats_index, resstat_values, 0);
1728 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1729 goto error;
1730 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* resstat */
1731
1732#ifdef HAVE_DNSTAP
1733 if (server->dtenv != NULL) {
1734 isc_stats_t *dnstapstats = NULL;
1735 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer,
1736 ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1737 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer,
1738 ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1739 ISC_XMLCHAR "dnstap"));
1740 dns_dt_getstats(named_g_server->dtenv, &dnstapstats);
1741 result = dump_counters(dnstapstats,
1742 isc_statsformat_xml, writer,
1743 NULL, dnstapstats_xmldesc,
1744 dns_dnstapcounter_max,
1745 dnstapstats_index,
1746 dnstapstat_values, 0);
1747 isc_stats_detach(&dnstapstats);
1748 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1749 goto error;
1750 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* dnstap */
1751 }
1752#endif
1753 }
1754
1755 if ((flags & STATS_XML_NET) != 0) {
1756 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1757 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1758 ISC_XMLCHAR "sockstat"));
1759
1760 result = dump_counters(server->sockstats, isc_statsformat_xml,
1761 writer, NULL, sockstats_xmldesc,
1762 isc_sockstatscounter_max,
1763 sockstats_index, sockstat_values,
1764 ISC_STATSDUMP_VERBOSE);
1765 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1766 goto error;
1767
1768 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* /sockstat */
1769 }
1770 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* /server */
1771
1772 if ((flags & STATS_XML_TRAFFIC) != 0) {
1773 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "traffic"));
1774 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "ipv4"));
1775 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "udp"));
1776 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1777 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1778 ISC_XMLCHAR "request-size"));
1779
1780 result = dump_counters(server->sctx->udpinstats4,
1781 isc_statsformat_xml, writer,
1782 NULL, udpinsizestats_xmldesc,
1783 dns_sizecounter_in_max,
1784 udpinsizestats_index,
1785 udpinsizestat_values, 0);
1786 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1787 goto error;
1788
1789 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </counters> */
1790
1791 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1792 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1793 ISC_XMLCHAR "response-size"));
1794
1795 result = dump_counters(server->sctx->udpoutstats4,
1796 isc_statsformat_xml, writer,
1797 NULL, udpoutsizestats_xmldesc,
1798 dns_sizecounter_out_max,
1799 udpoutsizestats_index,
1800 udpoutsizestat_values, 0);
1801 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1802 goto error;
1803
1804 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </counters> */
1805 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </udp> */
1806
1807 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "tcp"));
1808 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1809 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1810 ISC_XMLCHAR "request-size"));
1811
1812 result = dump_counters(server->sctx->tcpinstats4,
1813 isc_statsformat_xml, writer,
1814 NULL, tcpinsizestats_xmldesc,
1815 dns_sizecounter_in_max,
1816 tcpinsizestats_index,
1817 tcpinsizestat_values, 0);
1818 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1819 goto error;
1820
1821 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </counters> */
1822
1823 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1824 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1825 ISC_XMLCHAR "response-size"));
1826
1827 result = dump_counters(server->sctx->tcpoutstats4,
1828 isc_statsformat_xml, writer,
1829 NULL, tcpoutsizestats_xmldesc,
1830 dns_sizecounter_out_max,
1831 tcpoutsizestats_index,
1832 tcpoutsizestat_values, 0);
1833 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1834 goto error;
1835
1836 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </counters> */
1837 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </tcp> */
1838 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </ipv4> */
1839
1840 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "ipv6"));
1841 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "udp"));
1842 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1843 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1844 ISC_XMLCHAR "request-size"));
1845
1846 result = dump_counters(server->sctx->udpinstats6,
1847 isc_statsformat_xml, writer,
1848 NULL, udpinsizestats_xmldesc,
1849 dns_sizecounter_in_max,
1850 udpinsizestats_index,
1851 udpinsizestat_values, 0);
1852 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1853 goto error;
1854
1855 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </counters> */
1856
1857 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1858 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1859 ISC_XMLCHAR "response-size"));
1860
1861 result = dump_counters(server->sctx->udpoutstats6,
1862 isc_statsformat_xml, writer,
1863 NULL, udpoutsizestats_xmldesc,
1864 dns_sizecounter_out_max,
1865 udpoutsizestats_index,
1866 udpoutsizestat_values, 0);
1867 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1868 goto error;
1869
1870 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </counters> */
1871 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </udp> */
1872
1873 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "tcp"));
1874 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1875 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1876 ISC_XMLCHAR "request-size"));
1877
1878 result = dump_counters(server->sctx->tcpinstats6,
1879 isc_statsformat_xml, writer,
1880 NULL, tcpinsizestats_xmldesc,
1881 dns_sizecounter_in_max,
1882 tcpinsizestats_index,
1883 tcpinsizestat_values, 0);
1884 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1885 goto error;
1886
1887 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </counters> */
1888
1889 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1890 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1891 ISC_XMLCHAR "response-size"));
1892
1893 result = dump_counters(server->sctx->tcpoutstats6,
1894 isc_statsformat_xml, writer,
1895 NULL, tcpoutsizestats_xmldesc,
1896 dns_sizecounter_out_max,
1897 tcpoutsizestats_index,
1898 tcpoutsizestat_values, 0);
1899 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1900 goto error;
1901
1902 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </counters> */
1903 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </tcp> */
1904 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </ipv6> */
1905 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </traffic> */
1906 }
1907
1908 /*
1909 * Render views. For each view we know of, call its
1910 * rendering function.
1911 */
1912 view = ISC_LIST_HEAD(server->viewlist);
1913 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "views"));
1914 while (view != NULL &&
1915 ((flags & (STATS_XML_SERVER | STATS_XML_ZONES)) != 0))
1916 {
1917 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "view"));
1918 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "name",
1919 ISC_XMLCHAR view->name));
1920
1921 if ((flags & STATS_XML_ZONES) != 0) {
1922 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer,
1923 ISC_XMLCHAR "zones"));
1924 result = dns_zt_apply(view->zonetable, true,
1925 NULL, zone_xmlrender, writer);
1926 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1927 goto error;
1928 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* /zones */
1929 }
1930
1931 if ((flags & STATS_XML_SERVER) == 0) {
1932 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* /view */
1933 view = ISC_LIST_NEXT(view, link);
1934 continue;
1935 }
1936
1937 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer,
1938 ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1939 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1940 ISC_XMLCHAR "resqtype"));
1941
1942 if (view->resquerystats != NULL) {
1943 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
1944 dns_rdatatypestats_dump(view->resquerystats,
1945 rdtypestat_dump, &dumparg, 0);
1946 if (dumparg.result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1947 goto error;
1948 }
1949 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer));
1950
1951 /* <resstats> */
1952 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1953 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1954 ISC_XMLCHAR "resstats"));
1955 if (view->resstats != NULL) {
1956 result = dump_counters(view->resstats,
1957 isc_statsformat_xml, writer,
1958 NULL, resstats_xmldesc,
1959 dns_resstatscounter_max,
1960 resstats_index, resstat_values,
1961 ISC_STATSDUMP_VERBOSE);
1962 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1963 goto error;
1964 }
1965 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </resstats> */
1966
1967 cacherrstats = dns_db_getrrsetstats(view->cachedb);
1968 if (cacherrstats != NULL) {
1969 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer,
1970 ISC_XMLCHAR "cache"));
1971 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer,
1972 ISC_XMLCHAR "name",
1973 ISC_XMLCHAR
1974 dns_cache_getname(view->cache)));
1975 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
1976 dns_rdatasetstats_dump(cacherrstats, rdatasetstats_dump,
1977 &dumparg, 0);
1978 if (dumparg.result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1979 goto error;
1980 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* cache */
1981 }
1982
1983 /* <adbstats> */
1984 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
1985 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
1986 ISC_XMLCHAR "adbstat"));
1987 if (view->adbstats != NULL) {
1988 result = dump_counters(view->adbstats,
1989 isc_statsformat_xml, writer,
1990 NULL, adbstats_xmldesc,
1991 dns_adbstats_max,
1992 adbstats_index, adbstat_values,
1993 ISC_STATSDUMP_VERBOSE);
1994 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1995 goto error;
1996 }
1997 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </adbstats> */
1998
1999 /* <cachestats> */
2000 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "counters"));
2001 TRY0(xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "type",
2002 ISC_XMLCHAR "cachestats"));
2003 TRY0(dns_cache_renderxml(view->cache, writer));
2004 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* </cachestats> */
2005
2006 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* view */
2007
2008 view = ISC_LIST_NEXT(view, link);
2009 }
2010 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* /views */
2011
2012 if ((flags & STATS_XML_NET) != 0) {
2013 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer,
2014 ISC_XMLCHAR "socketmgr"));
2015 TRY0(isc_socketmgr_renderxml(named_g_socketmgr, writer));
2016 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* /socketmgr */
2017 }
2018
2019 if ((flags & STATS_XML_TASKS) != 0) {
2020 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "taskmgr"));
2021 TRY0(isc_taskmgr_renderxml(named_g_taskmgr, writer));
2022 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* /taskmgr */
2023 }
2024
2025 if ((flags & STATS_XML_MEM) != 0) {
2026 TRY0(xmlTextWriterStartElement(writer, ISC_XMLCHAR "memory"));
2027 TRY0(isc_mem_renderxml(writer));
2028 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* /memory */
2029 }
2030
2031
2032 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer)); /* /statistics */
2033 TRY0(xmlTextWriterEndDocument(writer));
2034
2035 xmlFreeTextWriter(writer);
2036
2037 xmlDocDumpFormatMemoryEnc(doc, buf, buflen, "UTF-8", 0);
2038 if (*buf == NULL)
2039 goto error;
2040 xmlFreeDoc(doc);
2041 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2042
2043 error:
2044 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
2045 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
2046 "failed generating XML response");
2047 if (writer != NULL)
2048 xmlFreeTextWriter(writer);
2049 if (doc != NULL)
2050 xmlFreeDoc(doc);
2051 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
2052}
2053
2054static void
2055wrap_xmlfree(isc_buffer_t *buffer, void *arg) {
2056 UNUSED(arg);
2057
2058 xmlFree(isc_buffer_base(buffer));
2059}
2060
2061static isc_result_t
2062render_xml(uint32_t flags, const char *url, isc_httpdurl_t *urlinfo,
2063 const char *querystring, const char *headers, void *arg,
2064 unsigned int *retcode, const char **retmsg,
2065 const char **mimetype, isc_buffer_t *b,
2066 isc_httpdfree_t **freecb, void **freecb_args)
2067{
2068 unsigned char *msg = NULL;
2069 int msglen;
2070 named_server_t *server = arg;
2071 isc_result_t result;
2072
2073 UNUSED(url);
2074 UNUSED(urlinfo);
2075 UNUSED(headers);
2076 UNUSED(querystring);
2077
2078 result = generatexml(server, flags, &msglen, &msg);
2079
2080 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2081 *retcode = 200;
2082 *retmsg = "OK";
2083 *mimetype = "text/xml";
2084 isc_buffer_reinit(b, msg, msglen);
2085 isc_buffer_add(b, msglen);
2086 *freecb = wrap_xmlfree;
2087 *freecb_args = NULL;
2088 } else
2089 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
2090 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
2091 "failed at rendering XML()");
2092
2093 return (result);
2094}
2095
2096static isc_result_t
2097render_xml_all(const char *url, isc_httpdurl_t *urlinfo,
2098 const char *querystring, const char *headers, void *arg,
2099 unsigned int *retcode, const char **retmsg,
2100 const char **mimetype, isc_buffer_t *b,
2101 isc_httpdfree_t **freecb, void **freecb_args)
2102{
2103 return (render_xml(STATS_XML_ALL, url, urlinfo,
2104 querystring, headers, arg,
2105 retcode, retmsg, mimetype, b,
2106 freecb, freecb_args));
2107}
