2201
2202#ifdef HAVE_JSON
2203/*
2204 * Which statistics to include when rendering to JSON
2205 */
2206#define STATS_JSON_STATUS 0x00 /* display only common statistics */
2207#define STATS_JSON_SERVER 0x01
2208#define STATS_JSON_ZONES 0x02
2209#define STATS_JSON_TASKS 0x04
2210#define STATS_JSON_NET 0x08
2211#define STATS_JSON_MEM 0x10
2212#define STATS_JSON_TRAFFIC 0x20
2213#define STATS_JSON_ALL 0xff
2214
2215#define CHECK(m) do { \
2216 result = (m); \
2217 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) \
2218 goto error; \
2219} while (0)
2220
2221#define CHECKMEM(m) do { \
2222 if (m == NULL) { \
2223 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;\
2224 goto error;\
2225 } \
2226} while(/*CONSTCOND*/0)
2227
2228static void
2229wrap_jsonfree(isc_buffer_t *buffer, void *arg) {
2230 json_object_put(isc_buffer_base(buffer));
2231 if (arg != NULL)
2232 json_object_put((json_object *) arg);
2233}
2234
2235static json_object *
2236addzone(char *name, char *classname, const char *ztype,
2237 uint32_t serial, bool add_serial)
2238{
2239 json_object *node = json_object_new_object();
2240
2241 if (node == NULL)
2242 return (NULL);
2243
2244 json_object_object_add(node, "name", json_object_new_string(name));
2245 json_object_object_add(node, "class",
2246 json_object_new_string(classname));
2247 if (add_serial)
2248 json_object_object_add(node, "serial",
2249 json_object_new_int64(serial));
2250 if (ztype != NULL)
2251 json_object_object_add(node, "type",
2252 json_object_new_string(ztype));
2253 return (node);
2254}
2255
2256static isc_result_t
2257zone_jsonrender(dns_zone_t *zone, void *arg) {
2258 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2259 char buf[1024 + 32]; /* sufficiently large for zone name and class */
2260 char classbuf[64]; /* sufficiently large for class */
2261 char *zone_name_only = NULL;
2262 char *class_only = NULL;
2263 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass;
2264 uint32_t serial;
2265 json_object *zonearray = (json_object *) arg;
2266 json_object *zoneobj = NULL;
2267 dns_zonestat_level_t statlevel;
2268
2269 statlevel = dns_zone_getstatlevel(zone);
2270 if (statlevel == dns_zonestat_none)
2271 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2272
2273 dns_zone_nameonly(zone, buf, sizeof(buf));
2274 zone_name_only = buf;
2275
2276 rdclass = dns_zone_getclass(zone);
2277 dns_rdataclass_format(rdclass, classbuf, sizeof(classbuf));
2278 class_only = classbuf;
2279
2280 if (dns_zone_getserial(zone, &serial) != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2281 zoneobj = addzone(zone_name_only, class_only,
2282 user_zonetype(zone), 0, false);
2283 else
2284 zoneobj = addzone(zone_name_only, class_only,
2285 user_zonetype(zone), serial, true);
2286
2287 if (zoneobj == NULL)
2288 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
2289
2290 if (statlevel == dns_zonestat_full) {
2291 isc_stats_t *zonestats;
2292 isc_stats_t *gluecachestats;
2293 dns_stats_t *rcvquerystats;
2294 uint64_t nsstat_values[ns_statscounter_max];
2295 uint64_t gluecachestats_values[dns_gluecachestatscounter_max];
2296
2297 zonestats = dns_zone_getrequeststats(zone);
2298 if (zonestats != NULL) {
2299 json_object *counters = json_object_new_object();
2300 if (counters == NULL) {
2301 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
2302 goto error;
2303 }
2304
2305 result = dump_counters(zonestats, isc_statsformat_json,
2306 counters, NULL, nsstats_xmldesc,
2307 ns_statscounter_max,
2308 nsstats_index,
2309 nsstat_values, 0);
2310 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2311 json_object_put(counters);
2312 goto error;
2313 }
2314
2315 if (json_object_get_object(counters)->count != 0)
2316 json_object_object_add(zoneobj,
2317 "rcodes", counters);
2318 else
2319 json_object_put(counters);
2320 }
2321
2322 gluecachestats = dns_zone_getgluecachestats(zone);
2323 if (gluecachestats != NULL) {
2324 json_object *counters = json_object_new_object();
2325 if (counters == NULL) {
2326 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
2327 goto error;
2328 }
2329
2330 result = dump_counters(gluecachestats,
2331 isc_statsformat_json,
2332 counters, NULL,
2333 gluecachestats_xmldesc,
2334 dns_gluecachestatscounter_max,
2335 gluecachestats_index,
2336 gluecachestats_values, 0);
2337 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2338 json_object_put(counters);
2339 goto error;
2340 }
2341
2342 if (json_object_get_object(counters)->count != 0)
2343 json_object_object_add(zoneobj,
2344 "gluecache", counters);
2345 else
2346 json_object_put(counters);
2347 }
2348
2349 rcvquerystats = dns_zone_getrcvquerystats(zone);
2350 if (rcvquerystats != NULL) {
2351 stats_dumparg_t dumparg;
2352 json_object *counters = json_object_new_object();
2353 CHECKMEM(counters);
2354
2355 dumparg.type = isc_statsformat_json;
2356 dumparg.arg = counters;
2357 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2358 dns_rdatatypestats_dump(rcvquerystats, rdtypestat_dump,
2359 &dumparg, 0);
2360 if (dumparg.result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2361 json_object_put(counters);
2362 goto error;
2363 }
2364
2365 if (json_object_get_object(counters)->count != 0)
2366 json_object_object_add(zoneobj,
2367 "qtypes", counters);
2368 else
2369 json_object_put(counters);
2370 }
2371 }
2372
2373 json_object_array_add(zonearray, zoneobj);
2374 zoneobj = NULL;
2375 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2376
2377 error:
2378 if (zoneobj != NULL)
2379 json_object_put(zoneobj);
2380 return (result);
2381}
2382
2383static isc_result_t
2384generatejson(named_server_t *server, size_t *msglen,
2385 const char **msg, json_object **rootp, uint32_t flags)
2386{
2387 dns_view_t *view;
2388 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2389 json_object *bindstats, *viewlist, *counters, *obj;
2390 json_object *traffic = NULL;
2391 json_object *udpreq4 = NULL, *udpresp4 = NULL;
2392 json_object *tcpreq4 = NULL, *tcpresp4 = NULL;
2393 json_object *udpreq6 = NULL, *udpresp6 = NULL;
2394 json_object *tcpreq6 = NULL, *tcpresp6 = NULL;
2395 uint64_t nsstat_values[ns_statscounter_max];
2396 uint64_t resstat_values[dns_resstatscounter_max];
2397 uint64_t adbstat_values[dns_adbstats_max];
2398 uint64_t zonestat_values[dns_zonestatscounter_max];
2399 uint64_t sockstat_values[isc_sockstatscounter_max];
2400 uint64_t udpinsizestat_values[dns_sizecounter_in_max];
2401 uint64_t udpoutsizestat_values[dns_sizecounter_out_max];
2402 uint64_t tcpinsizestat_values[dns_sizecounter_in_max];
2403 uint64_t tcpoutsizestat_values[dns_sizecounter_out_max];
2404#ifdef HAVE_DNSTAP
2405 uint64_t dnstapstat_values[dns_dnstapcounter_max];
2406#endif
2407 stats_dumparg_t dumparg;
2408 char boottime[sizeof "yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.sssZ"];
2409 char configtime[sizeof "yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.sssZ"];
2410 char nowstr[sizeof "yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.sssZ"];
2411 isc_time_t now;
2412
2413 REQUIRE(msglen != NULL);
2414 REQUIRE(msg != NULL && *msg == NULL);
2415 REQUIRE(rootp == NULL || *rootp == NULL);
2416
2417 bindstats = json_object_new_object();
2418 if (bindstats == NULL)
2419 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
2420
2421 /*
2422 * These statistics are included no matter which URL we use.
2423 */
2424 obj = json_object_new_string("1.5");
2425 CHECKMEM(obj);
2426 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "json-stats-version", obj);
2427
2428 isc_time_now(&now);
2429 isc_time_formatISO8601ms(&named_g_boottime,
2430 boottime, sizeof(boottime));
2431 isc_time_formatISO8601ms(&named_g_configtime,
2432 configtime, sizeof configtime);
2433 isc_time_formatISO8601ms(&now, nowstr, sizeof(nowstr));
2434
2435 obj = json_object_new_string(boottime);
2436 CHECKMEM(obj);
2437 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "boot-time", obj);
2438
2439 obj = json_object_new_string(configtime);
2440 CHECKMEM(obj);
2441 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "config-time", obj);
2442
2443 obj = json_object_new_string(nowstr);
2444 CHECKMEM(obj);
2445 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "current-time", obj);
2446 obj = json_object_new_string(named_g_version);
2447 CHECKMEM(obj);
2448 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "version", obj);
2449
2450 if ((flags & STATS_JSON_SERVER) != 0) {
2451 /* OPCODE counters */
2452 counters = json_object_new_object();
2453
2454 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2455 dumparg.type = isc_statsformat_json;
2456 dumparg.arg = counters;
2457
2458 dns_opcodestats_dump(server->sctx->opcodestats,
2459 opcodestat_dump, &dumparg,
2460 ISC_STATSDUMP_VERBOSE);
2461 if (dumparg.result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2462 json_object_put(counters);
2463 goto error;
2464 }
2465
2466 if (json_object_get_object(counters)->count != 0)
2467 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "opcodes", counters);
2468 else
2469 json_object_put(counters);
2470
2471 /* OPCODE counters */
2472 counters = json_object_new_object();
2473
2474 dumparg.type = isc_statsformat_json;
2475 dumparg.arg = counters;
2476
2477 dns_rcodestats_dump(server->sctx->rcodestats, rcodestat_dump,
2478 &dumparg, ISC_STATSDUMP_VERBOSE);
2479 if (dumparg.result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2480 json_object_put(counters);
2481 goto error;
2482 }
2483
2484 if (json_object_get_object(counters)->count != 0)
2485 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "rcodes", counters);
2486 else
2487 json_object_put(counters);
2488
2489 /* QTYPE counters */
2490 counters = json_object_new_object();
2491
2492 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2493 dumparg.arg = counters;
2494
2495 dns_rdatatypestats_dump(server->sctx->rcvquerystats,
2496 rdtypestat_dump, &dumparg, 0);
2497 if (dumparg.result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2498 json_object_put(counters);
2499 goto error;
2500 }
2501
2502 if (json_object_get_object(counters)->count != 0)
2503 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "qtypes", counters);
2504 else
2505 json_object_put(counters);
2506
2507 /* server stat counters */
2508 counters = json_object_new_object();
2509
2510 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2511 dumparg.arg = counters;
2512
2513 result = dump_counters(ns_stats_get(server->sctx->nsstats),
2514 isc_statsformat_json,
2515 counters, NULL, nsstats_xmldesc,
2516 ns_statscounter_max,
2517 nsstats_index, nsstat_values, 0);
2518 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2519 json_object_put(counters);
2520 goto error;
2521 }
2522
2523 if (json_object_get_object(counters)->count != 0)
2524 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "nsstats", counters);
2525 else
2526 json_object_put(counters);
2527
2528 /* zone stat counters */
2529 counters = json_object_new_object();
2530
2531 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2532 dumparg.arg = counters;
2533
2534 result = dump_counters(server->zonestats,
2535 isc_statsformat_json,
2536 counters, NULL, zonestats_xmldesc,
2537 dns_zonestatscounter_max,
2538 zonestats_index, zonestat_values, 0);
2539 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2540 json_object_put(counters);
2541 goto error;
2542 }
2543
2544 if (json_object_get_object(counters)->count != 0)
2545 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "zonestats",
2546 counters);
2547 else
2548 json_object_put(counters);
2549
2550 /* resolver stat counters */
2551 counters = json_object_new_object();
2552
2553 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2554 dumparg.arg = counters;
2555
2556 result = dump_counters(server->resolverstats,
2557 isc_statsformat_json, counters, NULL,
2558 resstats_xmldesc,
2559 dns_resstatscounter_max,
2560 resstats_index, resstat_values, 0);
2561 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2562 json_object_put(counters);
2563 goto error;
2564 }
2565
2566 if (json_object_get_object(counters)->count != 0)
2567 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "resstats", counters);
2568 else
2569 json_object_put(counters);
2570
2571#ifdef HAVE_DNSTAP
2572 /* dnstap stat counters */
2573 if (named_g_server->dtenv != NULL) {
2574 isc_stats_t *dnstapstats = NULL;
2575 dns_dt_getstats(named_g_server->dtenv, &dnstapstats);
2576 counters = json_object_new_object();
2577 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2578 dumparg.arg = counters;
2579 result = dump_counters(dnstapstats,
2580 isc_statsformat_json, counters,
2581 NULL, dnstapstats_xmldesc,
2582 dns_dnstapcounter_max,
2583 dnstapstats_index,
2584 dnstapstat_values, 0);
2585 isc_stats_detach(&dnstapstats);
2586 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2587 json_object_put(counters);
2588 goto error;
2589 }
2590
2591 if (json_object_get_object(counters)->count != 0)
2592 json_object_object_add(bindstats,
2593 "dnstapstats",
2594 counters);
2595 else
2596 json_object_put(counters);
2597 }
2598#endif
2599 }
2600
2601 if ((flags & (STATS_JSON_ZONES | STATS_JSON_SERVER)) != 0) {
2602 viewlist = json_object_new_object();
2603 CHECKMEM(viewlist);
2604
2605 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "views", viewlist);
2606
2607 view = ISC_LIST_HEAD(server->viewlist);
2608 while (view != NULL) {
2609 json_object *za, *v = json_object_new_object();
2610
2611 CHECKMEM(v);
2612 json_object_object_add(viewlist, view->name, v);
2613
2614 za = json_object_new_array();
2615 CHECKMEM(za);
2616
2617 if ((flags & STATS_JSON_ZONES) != 0) {
2618 result = dns_zt_apply(view->zonetable,
2619 true,
2620 NULL, zone_jsonrender,
2621 za);
2622 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2623 goto error;
2624 }
2625 }
2626
2627 if (json_object_array_length(za) != 0)
2628 json_object_object_add(v, "zones", za);
2629 else
2630 json_object_put(za);
2631
2632 if ((flags & STATS_JSON_SERVER) != 0) {
2633 json_object *res;
2634 dns_stats_t *dstats;
2635 isc_stats_t *istats;
2636
2637 res = json_object_new_object();
2638 CHECKMEM(res);
2639 json_object_object_add(v, "resolver", res);
2640
2641 istats = view->resstats;
2642 if (istats != NULL) {
2643 counters = json_object_new_object();
2644 CHECKMEM(counters);
2645
2646 result = dump_counters(istats,
2647 isc_statsformat_json,
2648 counters, NULL,
2649 resstats_xmldesc,
2650 dns_resstatscounter_max,
2651 resstats_index,
2652 resstat_values, 0);
2653 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2654 json_object_put(counters);
2655 result = dumparg.result;
2656 goto error;
2657 }
2658
2659 json_object_object_add(res, "stats",
2660 counters);
2661 }
2662
2663 dstats = view->resquerystats;
2664 if (dstats != NULL) {
2665 counters = json_object_new_object();
2666 CHECKMEM(counters);
2667
2668 dumparg.arg = counters;
2669 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2670 dns_rdatatypestats_dump(dstats,
2671 rdtypestat_dump,
2672 &dumparg, 0);
2673 if (dumparg.result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2674 json_object_put(counters);
2675 result = dumparg.result;
2676 goto error;
2677 }
2678
2679 json_object_object_add(res, "qtypes",
2680 counters);
2681 }
2682
2683 dstats = dns_db_getrrsetstats(view->cachedb);
2684 if (dstats != NULL) {
2685 counters = json_object_new_object();
2686 CHECKMEM(counters);
2687
2688 dumparg.arg = counters;
2689 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2690 dns_rdatasetstats_dump(dstats,
2691 rdatasetstats_dump,
2692 &dumparg, 0);
2693 if (dumparg.result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2694 json_object_put(counters);
2695 result = dumparg.result;
2696 goto error;
2697 }
2698
2699 json_object_object_add(res,
2700 "cache",
2701 counters);
2702 }
2703
2704 counters = json_object_new_object();
2705 CHECKMEM(counters);
2706
2707 result = dns_cache_renderjson(view->cache,
2708 counters);
2709 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2710 json_object_put(counters);
2711 goto error;
2712 }
2713
2714 json_object_object_add(res, "cachestats",
2715 counters);
2716
2717 istats = view->adbstats;
2718 if (istats != NULL) {
2719 counters = json_object_new_object();
2720 CHECKMEM(counters);
2721
2722 result = dump_counters(istats,
2723 isc_statsformat_json,
2724 counters, NULL,
2725 adbstats_xmldesc,
2726 dns_adbstats_max,
2727 adbstats_index,
2728 adbstat_values, 0);
2729 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2730 json_object_put(counters);
2731 result = dumparg.result;
2732 goto error;
2733 }
2734
2735 json_object_object_add(res, "adb",
2736 counters);
2737 }
2738 }
2739
2740 view = ISC_LIST_NEXT(view, link);
2741 }
2742 }
2743
2744 if ((flags & STATS_JSON_NET) != 0) {
2745 /* socket stat counters */
2746 json_object *sockets;
2747 counters = json_object_new_object();
2748
2749 dumparg.result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2750 dumparg.arg = counters;
2751
2752 result = dump_counters(server->sockstats,
2753 isc_statsformat_json, counters,
2754 NULL, sockstats_xmldesc,
2755 isc_sockstatscounter_max,
2756 sockstats_index, sockstat_values, 0);
2757 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2758 json_object_put(counters);
2759 goto error;
2760 }
2761
2762 if (json_object_get_object(counters)->count != 0)
2763 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "sockstats",
2764 counters);
2765 else
2766 json_object_put(counters);
2767
2768 sockets = json_object_new_object();
2769 CHECKMEM(sockets);
2770
2771 result = isc_socketmgr_renderjson(named_g_socketmgr, sockets);
2772 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2773 json_object_put(sockets);
2774 goto error;
2775 }
2776
2777 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "socketmgr", sockets);
2778 }
2779
2780 if ((flags & STATS_JSON_TASKS) != 0) {
2781 json_object *tasks = json_object_new_object();
2782 CHECKMEM(tasks);
2783
2784 result = isc_taskmgr_renderjson(named_g_taskmgr, tasks);
2785 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2786 json_object_put(tasks);
2787 goto error;
2788 }
2789
2790 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "taskmgr", tasks);
2791 }
2792
2793 if ((flags & STATS_JSON_MEM) != 0) {
2794 json_object *memory = json_object_new_object();
2795 CHECKMEM(memory);
2796
2797 result = isc_mem_renderjson(memory);
2798 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2799 json_object_put(memory);
2800 goto error;
2801 }
2802
2803 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "memory", memory);
2804 }
2805
2806 if ((flags & STATS_JSON_TRAFFIC) != 0) {
2807
2808 traffic = json_object_new_object();
2809 CHECKMEM(traffic);
2810
2811 udpreq4 = json_object_new_object();
2812 CHECKMEM(udpreq4);
2813
2814 udpresp4 = json_object_new_object();
2815 CHECKMEM(udpresp4);
2816
2817 tcpreq4 = json_object_new_object();
2818 CHECKMEM(tcpreq4);
2819
2820 tcpresp4 = json_object_new_object();
2821 CHECKMEM(tcpresp4);
2822
2823 udpreq6 = json_object_new_object();
2824 CHECKMEM(udpreq6);
2825
2826 udpresp6 = json_object_new_object();
2827 CHECKMEM(udpresp6);
2828
2829 tcpreq6 = json_object_new_object();
2830 CHECKMEM(tcpreq6);
2831
2832 tcpresp6 = json_object_new_object();
2833 CHECKMEM(tcpresp6);
2834
2835 CHECK(dump_counters(server->sctx->udpinstats4,
2836 isc_statsformat_json, udpreq4, NULL,
2837 udpinsizestats_xmldesc,
2838 dns_sizecounter_in_max,
2839 udpinsizestats_index,
2840 udpinsizestat_values, 0));
2841
2842 CHECK(dump_counters(server->sctx->udpoutstats4,
2843 isc_statsformat_json, udpresp4, NULL,
2844 udpoutsizestats_xmldesc,
2845 dns_sizecounter_out_max,
2846 udpoutsizestats_index,
2847 udpoutsizestat_values, 0));
2848
2849 CHECK(dump_counters(server->sctx->tcpinstats4,
2850 isc_statsformat_json, tcpreq4, NULL,
2851 tcpinsizestats_xmldesc,
2852 dns_sizecounter_in_max,
2853 tcpinsizestats_index,
2854 tcpinsizestat_values, 0));
2855
2856 CHECK(dump_counters(server->sctx->tcpoutstats4,
2857 isc_statsformat_json, tcpresp4, NULL,
2858 tcpoutsizestats_xmldesc,
2859 dns_sizecounter_out_max,
2860 tcpoutsizestats_index,
2861 tcpoutsizestat_values, 0));
2862
2863 CHECK(dump_counters(server->sctx->udpinstats6,
2864 isc_statsformat_json, udpreq6, NULL,
2865 udpinsizestats_xmldesc,
2866 dns_sizecounter_in_max,
2867 udpinsizestats_index,
2868 udpinsizestat_values, 0));
2869
2870 CHECK(dump_counters(server->sctx->udpoutstats6,
2871 isc_statsformat_json, udpresp6, NULL,
2872 udpoutsizestats_xmldesc,
2873 dns_sizecounter_out_max,
2874 udpoutsizestats_index,
2875 udpoutsizestat_values, 0));
2876
2877 CHECK(dump_counters(server->sctx->tcpinstats6,
2878 isc_statsformat_json, tcpreq6, NULL,
2879 tcpinsizestats_xmldesc,
2880 dns_sizecounter_in_max,
2881 tcpinsizestats_index,
2882 tcpinsizestat_values, 0));
2883
2884 CHECK(dump_counters(server->sctx->tcpoutstats6,
2885 isc_statsformat_json, tcpresp6, NULL,
2886 tcpoutsizestats_xmldesc,
2887 dns_sizecounter_out_max,
2888 tcpoutsizestats_index,
2889 tcpoutsizestat_values, 0));
2890
2891 json_object_object_add(traffic,
2892 "dns-udp-requests-sizes-received-ipv4",
2893 udpreq4);
2894 json_object_object_add(traffic,
2895 "dns-udp-responses-sizes-sent-ipv4",
2896 udpresp4);
2897 json_object_object_add(traffic,
2898 "dns-tcp-requests-sizes-received-ipv4",
2899 tcpreq4);
2900 json_object_object_add(traffic,
2901 "dns-tcp-responses-sizes-sent-ipv4",
2902 tcpresp4);
2903 json_object_object_add(traffic,
2904 "dns-udp-requests-sizes-received-ipv6",
2905 udpreq6);
2906 json_object_object_add(traffic,
2907 "dns-udp-responses-sizes-sent-ipv6",
2908 udpresp6);
2909 json_object_object_add(traffic,
2910 "dns-tcp-requests-sizes-received-ipv6",
2911 tcpreq6);
2912 json_object_object_add(traffic,
2913 "dns-tcp-responses-sizes-sent-ipv6",
2914 tcpresp6);
2915 json_object_object_add(bindstats, "traffic", traffic);
2916 udpreq4 = NULL;
2917 udpresp4 = NULL;
2918 tcpreq4 = NULL;
2919 tcpresp4 = NULL;
2920 udpreq6 = NULL;
2921 udpresp6 = NULL;
2922 tcpreq6 = NULL;
2923 tcpresp6 = NULL;
2924 traffic = NULL;
2925 }
2926
2927 *msg = json_object_to_json_string_ext(bindstats,
2928 JSON_C_TO_STRING_PRETTY);
2929 *msglen = strlen(*msg);
2930
2931 if (rootp != NULL) {
2932 *rootp = bindstats;
2933 bindstats = NULL;
2934 }
2935
2936 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2937
2938 error:
2939 if (udpreq4 != NULL)
2940 json_object_put(udpreq4);
2941 if (udpresp4 != NULL)
2942 json_object_put(udpresp4);
2943 if (tcpreq4 != NULL)
2944 json_object_put(tcpreq4);
2945 if (tcpresp4 != NULL)
2946 json_object_put(tcpresp4);
2947 if (udpreq6 != NULL)
2948 json_object_put(udpreq6);
2949 if (udpresp6 != NULL)
2950 json_object_put(udpresp6);
2951 if (tcpreq6 != NULL)
2952 json_object_put(tcpreq6);
2953 if (tcpresp6 != NULL)
2954 json_object_put(tcpresp6);
2955 if (traffic != NULL)
2956 json_object_put(traffic);
2957 if (bindstats != NULL)
2958 json_object_put(bindstats);
2959
2960 return (result);
2961}
2962
2963static isc_result_t
2964render_json(uint32_t flags,
2965 const char *url, isc_httpdurl_t *urlinfo,
2966 const char *querystring, const char *headers,
2967 void *arg, unsigned int *retcode, const char **retmsg,
2968 const char **mimetype, isc_buffer_t *b,
2969 isc_httpdfree_t **freecb, void **freecb_args)
2970{
2971 isc_result_t result;
2972 json_object *bindstats = NULL;
2973 named_server_t *server = arg;
2974 const char *msg = NULL;
2975 size_t msglen = 0;
2976 char *p;
2977
2978 UNUSED(url);
2979 UNUSED(urlinfo);
2980 UNUSED(headers);
2981 UNUSED(querystring);
2982
2983 result = generatejson(server, &msglen, &msg, &bindstats, flags);
2984 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2985 *retcode = 200;
2986 *retmsg = "OK";
2987 *mimetype = "application/json";
2988 DE_CONST(msg, p);
2989 isc_buffer_reinit(b, p, msglen);
2990 isc_buffer_add(b, msglen);
2991 *freecb = wrap_jsonfree;
2992 *freecb_args = bindstats;
2993 } else
2994 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
2995 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
2996 "failed at rendering JSON()");
2997
2998 return (result);
2999}
3000
3001static isc_result_t
3002render_json_all(const char *url, isc_httpdurl_t *urlinfo,
3003 const char *querystring, const char *headers, void *arg,
3004 unsigned int *retcode, const char **retmsg,
3005 const char **mimetype, isc_buffer_t *b,
3006 isc_httpdfree_t **freecb, void **freecb_args)
3007{
3008 return (render_json(STATS_JSON_ALL, url, urlinfo,
3009 querystring, headers, arg,
3010 retcode, retmsg, mimetype, b,
3011 freecb, freecb_args));
3012}

3018 const char **mimetype, isc_buffer_t *b,
3019 isc_httpdfree_t **freecb, void **freecb_args)
3020{
3021 return (render_json(STATS_JSON_STATUS, url, urlinfo,
3022 querystring, headers, arg,
3023 retcode, retmsg, mimetype, b,
3024 freecb, freecb_args));
3025}

3092static isc_result_t
3093render_json_traffic(const char *url, isc_httpdurl_t *urlinfo,
3094 const char *querystring, const char *headers, void *arg,

3100 querystring, headers, arg,
3101 retcode, retmsg, mimetype, b,
3102 freecb, freecb_args));

3106
3107static isc_result_t
3108render_xsl(const char *url, isc_httpdurl_t *urlinfo,
3109 const char *querystring, const char *headers,
3110 void *args, unsigned int *retcode, const char **retmsg,
3111 const char **mimetype, isc_buffer_t *b,
3112 isc_httpdfree_t **freecb, void **freecb_args)
3113{
3114 isc_result_t result;
3115 char *_headers = NULL;
3116
3117 UNUSED(url);
3118 UNUSED(querystring);
3119 UNUSED(args);
3120
3121 *freecb = NULL;
3122 *freecb_args = NULL;
3123 *mimetype = "text/xslt+xml";
3124
3125 if (urlinfo->isstatic) {
3126 isc_time_t when;
3127 char *line, *saveptr;
3128 const char *if_modified_since = "If-Modified-Since: ";
3129 _headers = strdup(headers);
3130
3131 if (_headers == NULL) {
3132 goto send;
3133 }
3134
3135 saveptr = NULL;
3136 for (line = strtok_r(_headers, "\n", &saveptr);
3137 line;
3138 line = strtok_r(NULL, "\n", &saveptr)) {
3139 if (strncasecmp(line, if_modified_since,
3140 strlen(if_modified_since)) == 0) {
3141 time_t t1, t2;
3142 line += strlen(if_modified_since);
3143 result = isc_time_parsehttptimestamp(line, &when);
3144 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
3145 goto send;
3146 }
3147
3148 result = isc_time_secondsastimet(&when, &t1);
3149 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
3150 goto send;
3151 }
3152
3153 result = isc_time_secondsastimet(&urlinfo->loadtime, &t2);
3154 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
3155 goto send;
3156 }
3157
3158 if (t1 < t2) {
3159 goto send;
3160 }
3161
3162 *retcode = 304;
3163 *retmsg = "Not modified";
3164 goto end;
3165 }
3166 }
3167 }
3168
3169 send:
3170 *retcode = 200;
3171 *retmsg = "OK";
3172 isc_buffer_reinit(b, xslmsg, strlen(xslmsg));
3173 isc_buffer_add(b, strlen(xslmsg));
3174end:
3175 free(_headers);
3176 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
3177}
3178
3179static void
3180shutdown_listener(named_statschannel_t *listener) {
3181 char socktext[ISC_SOCKADDR_FORMATSIZE];
3182 isc_sockaddr_format(&listener->address, socktext, sizeof(socktext));
3183 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
3184 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
3185 "stopping statistics channel on %s",
3186 socktext);
3187
3188 isc_httpdmgr_shutdown(&listener->httpdmgr);
3189}
3190
3191static bool
3192client_ok(const isc_sockaddr_t *fromaddr, void *arg) {
3193 named_statschannel_t *listener = arg;
3194 dns_aclenv_t *env =
3195 ns_interfacemgr_getaclenv(named_g_server->interfacemgr);
3196 isc_netaddr_t netaddr;
3197 char socktext[ISC_SOCKADDR_FORMATSIZE];
3198 int match;
3199
3200 REQUIRE(listener != NULL);
3201
3202 isc_netaddr_fromsockaddr(&netaddr, fromaddr);
3203
3204 LOCK(&listener->lock);
3205 if ((dns_acl_match(&netaddr, NULL, listener->acl, env,
3206 &match, NULL) == ISC_R_SUCCESS) && match > 0)
3207 {
3208 UNLOCK(&listener->lock);
3209 return (true);
3210 }
3211 UNLOCK(&listener->lock);
3212
3213 isc_sockaddr_format(fromaddr, socktext, sizeof(socktext));
3214 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
3215 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_WARNING,
3216 "rejected statistics connection from %s", socktext);
3217
3218 return (false);
3219}
3220
3221static void
3222destroy_listener(void *arg) {
3223 named_statschannel_t *listener = arg;
3224
3225 REQUIRE(listener != NULL);
3226 REQUIRE(!ISC_LINK_LINKED(listener, link));
3227
3228 /* We don't have to acquire the lock here since it's already unlinked */
3229 dns_acl_detach(&listener->acl);
3230
3231 isc_mutex_destroy(&listener->lock);
3232 isc_mem_putanddetach(&listener->mctx, listener, sizeof(*listener));
3233}
3234
3235static isc_result_t
3236add_listener(named_server_t *server, named_statschannel_t **listenerp,
3237 const cfg_obj_t *listen_params, const cfg_obj_t *config,
3238 isc_sockaddr_t *addr, cfg_aclconfctx_t *aclconfctx,
3239 const char *socktext)
3240{
3241 isc_result_t result;
3242 named_statschannel_t *listener;
3243 isc_task_t *task = NULL;
3244 isc_socket_t *sock = NULL;
3245 const cfg_obj_t *allow;
3246 dns_acl_t *new_acl = NULL;
3247
3248 listener = isc_mem_get(server->mctx, sizeof(*listener));
3249 if (listener == NULL)
3250 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
3251
3252 listener->httpdmgr = NULL;
3253 listener->address = *addr;
3254 listener->acl = NULL;
3255 listener->mctx = NULL;
3256 ISC_LINK_INIT(listener, link);
3257
3258 isc_mutex_init(&listener->lock);
3259
3260 isc_mem_attach(server->mctx, &listener->mctx);
3261
3262 allow = cfg_tuple_get(listen_params, "allow");
3263 if (allow != NULL && cfg_obj_islist(allow)) {
3264 result = cfg_acl_fromconfig(allow, config, named_g_lctx,
3265 aclconfctx, listener->mctx, 0,
3266 &new_acl);
3267 } else
3268 result = dns_acl_any(listener->mctx, &new_acl);
3269 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
3270 goto cleanup;
3271 dns_acl_attach(new_acl, &listener->acl);
3272 dns_acl_detach(&new_acl);
3273
3274 result = isc_task_create(named_g_taskmgr, 0, &task);
3275 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
3276 goto cleanup;
3277 isc_task_setname(task, "statchannel", NULL);
3278
3279 result = isc_socket_create(named_g_socketmgr, isc_sockaddr_pf(addr),
3280 isc_sockettype_tcp, &sock);
3281 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
3282 goto cleanup;
3283 isc_socket_setname(sock, "statchannel", NULL);
3284
3285#ifndef ISC_ALLOW_MAPPED
3286 isc_socket_ipv6only(sock, true);
3287#endif
3288
3289 result = isc_socket_bind(sock, addr, ISC_SOCKET_REUSEADDRESS);
3290 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
3291 goto cleanup;
3292
3293 result = isc_httpdmgr_create(server->mctx, sock, task, client_ok,
3294 destroy_listener, listener,
3295 named_g_timermgr, &listener->httpdmgr);
3296 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
3297 goto cleanup;
3298
3299#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
3300 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/",
3301 render_xml_all, server);
3302 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/xml",
3303 render_xml_all, server);
3304 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/xml/v3",
3305 render_xml_all, server);
3306 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/xml/v3/status",
3307 render_xml_status, server);
3308 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/xml/v3/server",
3309 render_xml_server, server);
3310 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/xml/v3/zones",
3311 render_xml_zones, server);
3312 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/xml/v3/net",
3313 render_xml_net, server);
3314 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/xml/v3/tasks",
3315 render_xml_tasks, server);
3316 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/xml/v3/mem",
3317 render_xml_mem, server);
3318 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/xml/v3/traffic",
3319 render_xml_traffic, server);
3320#endif
3321#ifdef HAVE_JSON
3322 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/json",
3323 render_json_all, server);
3324 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/json/v1",
3325 render_json_all, server);
3326 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/json/v1/status",
3327 render_json_status, server);
3328 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/json/v1/server",
3329 render_json_server, server);
3330 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/json/v1/zones",
3331 render_json_zones, server);
3332 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/json/v1/tasks",
3333 render_json_tasks, server);
3334 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/json/v1/net",
3335 render_json_net, server);
3336 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/json/v1/mem",
3337 render_json_mem, server);
3338 isc_httpdmgr_addurl(listener->httpdmgr, "/json/v1/traffic",
3339 render_json_traffic, server);
3340#endif
3341 isc_httpdmgr_addurl2(listener->httpdmgr, "/bind9.xsl", true,
3342 render_xsl, server);
3343
3344 *listenerp = listener;
3345 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
3346 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_NOTICE,
3347 "statistics channel listening on %s", socktext);
3348
3349cleanup:
3350 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
3351 if (listener->acl != NULL)
3352 dns_acl_detach(&listener->acl);
3353 isc_mutex_destroy(&listener->lock);
3354 isc_mem_putanddetach(&listener->mctx, listener,
3355 sizeof(*listener));
3356 }
3357 if (task != NULL)
3358 isc_task_detach(&task);
3359 if (sock != NULL)
3360 isc_socket_detach(&sock);
3361
3362 return (result);
3363}
3364
3365static void
3366update_listener(named_server_t *server, named_statschannel_t **listenerp,
3367 const cfg_obj_t *listen_params, const cfg_obj_t *config,
3368 isc_sockaddr_t *addr, cfg_aclconfctx_t *aclconfctx,
3369 const char *socktext)
3370{
3371 named_statschannel_t *listener;
3372 const cfg_obj_t *allow = NULL;
3373 dns_acl_t *new_acl = NULL;
3374 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
3375
3376 for (listener = ISC_LIST_HEAD(server->statschannels);
3377 listener != NULL;
3378 listener = ISC_LIST_NEXT(listener, link))
3379 if (isc_sockaddr_equal(addr, &listener->address))
3380 break;
3381
3382 if (listener == NULL) {
3383 *listenerp = NULL;
3384 return;
3385 }
3386
3387 /*
3388 * Now, keep the old access list unless a new one can be made.
3389 */
3390 allow = cfg_tuple_get(listen_params, "allow");
3391 if (allow != NULL && cfg_obj_islist(allow)) {
3392 result = cfg_acl_fromconfig(allow, config, named_g_lctx,
3393 aclconfctx, listener->mctx, 0,
3394 &new_acl);
3395 } else
3396 result = dns_acl_any(listener->mctx, &new_acl);
3397
3398 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
3399 LOCK(&listener->lock);
3400
3401 dns_acl_detach(&listener->acl);
3402 dns_acl_attach(new_acl, &listener->acl);
3403 dns_acl_detach(&new_acl);
3404
3405 UNLOCK(&listener->lock);
3406 } else {
3407 cfg_obj_log(listen_params, named_g_lctx, ISC_LOG_WARNING,
3408 "couldn't install new acl for "
3409 "statistics channel %s: %s",
3410 socktext, isc_result_totext(result));
3411 }
3412
3413 *listenerp = listener;
3414}
3415
3416isc_result_t
3417named_statschannels_configure(named_server_t *server, const cfg_obj_t *config,
3418 cfg_aclconfctx_t *aclconfctx)
3419{
3420 named_statschannel_t *listener, *listener_next;
3421 named_statschannellist_t new_listeners;
3422 const cfg_obj_t *statschannellist = NULL;
3423 const cfg_listelt_t *element, *element2;
3424 char socktext[ISC_SOCKADDR_FORMATSIZE];
3425
3426 RUNTIME_CHECK(isc_once_do(&once, init_desc) == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
3427
3428 ISC_LIST_INIT(new_listeners);
3429
3430 /*
3431 * Get the list of named.conf 'statistics-channels' statements.
3432 */
3433 (void)cfg_map_get(config, "statistics-channels", &statschannellist);
3434
3435 /*
3436 * Run through the new address/port list, noting sockets that are
3437 * already being listened on and moving them to the new list.
3438 *
3439 * Identifying duplicate addr/port combinations is left to either
3440 * the underlying config code, or to the bind attempt getting an
3441 * address-in-use error.
3442 */
3443 if (statschannellist != NULL) {
3444#ifndef EXTENDED_STATS
3445 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
3446 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_WARNING,
3447 "statistics-channels specified but not effective "
3448 "due to missing XML and/or JSON library");
3449#else /* EXTENDED_STATS */
3450#ifndef HAVE_LIBXML2
3451 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
3452 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_WARNING,
3453 "statistics-channels: XML library missing, "
3454 "only JSON stats will be available");
3455#endif /* !HAVE_LIBXML2 */
3456#ifndef HAVE_JSON
3457 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
3458 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_WARNING,
3459 "statistics-channels: JSON library missing, "
3460 "only XML stats will be available");
3461#endif /* !HAVE_JSON */
3462#endif /* EXTENDED_STATS */
3463
3464 for (element = cfg_list_first(statschannellist);
3465 element != NULL;
3466 element = cfg_list_next(element)) {
3467 const cfg_obj_t *statschannel;
3468 const cfg_obj_t *listenercfg = NULL;
3469
3470 statschannel = cfg_listelt_value(element);
3471 (void)cfg_map_get(statschannel, "inet",
3472 &listenercfg);
3473 if (listenercfg == NULL)
3474 continue;
3475
3476 for (element2 = cfg_list_first(listenercfg);
3477 element2 != NULL;
3478 element2 = cfg_list_next(element2)) {
3479 const cfg_obj_t *listen_params;
3480 const cfg_obj_t *obj;
3481 isc_sockaddr_t addr;
3482
3483 listen_params = cfg_listelt_value(element2);
3484
3485 obj = cfg_tuple_get(listen_params, "address");
3486 addr = *cfg_obj_assockaddr(obj);
3487 if (isc_sockaddr_getport(&addr) == 0)
3488 isc_sockaddr_setport(&addr,
3489 NAMED_STATSCHANNEL_HTTPPORT);
3490
3491 isc_sockaddr_format(&addr, socktext,
3492 sizeof(socktext));
3493
3494 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx,
3495 NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
3496 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER,
3497 ISC_LOG_DEBUG(9),
3498 "processing statistics "
3499 "channel %s",
3500 socktext);
3501
3502 update_listener(server, &listener,
3503 listen_params, config, &addr,
3504 aclconfctx, socktext);
3505
3506 if (listener != NULL) {
3507 /*
3508 * Remove the listener from the old
3509 * list, so it won't be shut down.
3510 */
3511 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(server->statschannels,
3512 listener, link);
3513 } else {
3514 /*
3515 * This is a new listener.
3516 */
3517 isc_result_t r;
3518
3519 r = add_listener(server, &listener,
3520 listen_params, config,
3521 &addr, aclconfctx,
3522 socktext);
3523 if (r != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
3524 cfg_obj_log(listen_params,
3525 named_g_lctx,
3526 ISC_LOG_WARNING,
3527 "couldn't allocate "
3528 "statistics channel"
3529 " %s: %s",
3530 socktext,
3531 isc_result_totext(r));
3532 }
3533 }
3534
3535 if (listener != NULL)
3536 ISC_LIST_APPEND(new_listeners, listener,
3537 link);
3538 }
3539 }
3540 }
3541
3542 for (listener = ISC_LIST_HEAD(server->statschannels);
3543 listener != NULL;
3544 listener = listener_next) {
3545 listener_next = ISC_LIST_NEXT(listener, link);
3546 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(server->statschannels, listener, link);
3547 shutdown_listener(listener);
3548 }
3549
3550 ISC_LIST_APPENDLIST(server->statschannels, new_listeners, link);
3551 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
3552}
3553
3554void
3555named_statschannels_shutdown(named_server_t *server) {
3556 named_statschannel_t *listener;
3557
3558 while ((listener = ISC_LIST_HEAD(server->statschannels)) != NULL) {
3559 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(server->statschannels, listener, link);
3560 shutdown_listener(listener);
3561 }
3562}
3563
3564isc_result_t
3565named_stats_dump(named_server_t *server, FILE *fp) {
3566 isc_stdtime_t now;
3567 isc_result_t result;
3568 dns_view_t *view;
3569 dns_zone_t *zone, *next;
3570 stats_dumparg_t dumparg;
3571 uint64_t nsstat_values[ns_statscounter_max];
3572 uint64_t resstat_values[dns_resstatscounter_max];
3573 uint64_t adbstat_values[dns_adbstats_max];
3574 uint64_t zonestat_values[dns_zonestatscounter_max];
3575 uint64_t sockstat_values[isc_sockstatscounter_max];
3576 uint64_t gluecachestats_values[dns_gluecachestatscounter_max];
3577
3578 RUNTIME_CHECK(isc_once_do(&once, init_desc) == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
3579
3580 /* Set common fields */
3581 dumparg.type = isc_statsformat_file;
3582 dumparg.arg = fp;
3583
3584 isc_stdtime_get(&now);
3585 fprintf(fp, "+++ Statistics Dump +++ (%lu)\n", (unsigned long)now);
3586
3587 fprintf(fp, "++ Incoming Requests ++\n");
3588 dns_opcodestats_dump(server->sctx->opcodestats,
3589 opcodestat_dump, &dumparg, 0);
3590
3591 fprintf(fp, "++ Incoming Queries ++\n");
3592 dns_rdatatypestats_dump(server->sctx->rcvquerystats,
3593 rdtypestat_dump, &dumparg, 0);
3594
3595 fprintf(fp, "++ Outgoing Rcodes ++\n");
3596 dns_rcodestats_dump(server->sctx->rcodestats,
3597 rcodestat_dump, &dumparg, 0);
3598
3599 fprintf(fp, "++ Outgoing Queries ++\n");
3600 for (view = ISC_LIST_HEAD(server->viewlist);
3601 view != NULL;
3602 view = ISC_LIST_NEXT(view, link)) {
3603 if (view->resquerystats == NULL)
3604 continue;
3605 if (strcmp(view->name, "_default") == 0)
3606 fprintf(fp, "[View: default]\n");
3607 else
3608 fprintf(fp, "[View: %s]\n", view->name);
3609 dns_rdatatypestats_dump(view->resquerystats, rdtypestat_dump,
3610 &dumparg, 0);
3611 }
3612
3613 fprintf(fp, "++ Name Server Statistics ++\n");
3614 (void) dump_counters(ns_stats_get(server->sctx->nsstats),
3615 isc_statsformat_file, fp, NULL,
3616 nsstats_desc, ns_statscounter_max,
3617 nsstats_index, nsstat_values, 0);
3618
3619 fprintf(fp, "++ Zone Maintenance Statistics ++\n");
3620 (void) dump_counters(server->zonestats, isc_statsformat_file, fp, NULL,
3621 zonestats_desc, dns_zonestatscounter_max,
3622 zonestats_index, zonestat_values, 0);
3623
3624 fprintf(fp, "++ Resolver Statistics ++\n");
3625 fprintf(fp, "[Common]\n");
3626 (void) dump_counters(server->resolverstats, isc_statsformat_file, fp,
3627 NULL, resstats_desc, dns_resstatscounter_max,
3628 resstats_index, resstat_values, 0);
3629 for (view = ISC_LIST_HEAD(server->viewlist);
3630 view != NULL;
3631 view = ISC_LIST_NEXT(view, link)) {
3632 if (view->resstats == NULL)
3633 continue;
3634 if (strcmp(view->name, "_default") == 0)
3635 fprintf(fp, "[View: default]\n");
3636 else
3637 fprintf(fp, "[View: %s]\n", view->name);
3638 (void) dump_counters(view->resstats, isc_statsformat_file, fp,
3639 NULL, resstats_desc,
3640 dns_resstatscounter_max, resstats_index,
3641 resstat_values, 0);
3642 }
3643
3644 fprintf(fp, "++ Cache Statistics ++\n");
3645 for (view = ISC_LIST_HEAD(server->viewlist);
3646 view != NULL;
3647 view = ISC_LIST_NEXT(view, link)) {
3648 if (strcmp(view->name, "_default") == 0)
3649 fprintf(fp, "[View: default]\n");
3650 else
3651 fprintf(fp, "[View: %s (Cache: %s)]\n", view->name,
3652 dns_cache_getname(view->cache));
3653 /*
3654 * Avoid dumping redundant statistics when the cache is shared.
3655 */
3656 if (dns_view_iscacheshared(view))
3657 continue;
3658 dns_cache_dumpstats(view->cache, fp);
3659 }
3660
3661 fprintf(fp, "++ Cache DB RRsets ++\n");
3662 for (view = ISC_LIST_HEAD(server->viewlist);
3663 view != NULL;
3664 view = ISC_LIST_NEXT(view, link)) {
3665 dns_stats_t *cacherrstats;
3666
3667 cacherrstats = dns_db_getrrsetstats(view->cachedb);
3668 if (cacherrstats == NULL)
3669 continue;
3670 if (strcmp(view->name, "_default") == 0)
3671 fprintf(fp, "[View: default]\n");
3672 else
3673 fprintf(fp, "[View: %s (Cache: %s)]\n", view->name,
3674 dns_cache_getname(view->cache));
3675 if (dns_view_iscacheshared(view)) {
3676 /*
3677 * Avoid dumping redundant statistics when the cache is
3678 * shared.
3679 */
3680 continue;
3681 }
3682 dns_rdatasetstats_dump(cacherrstats, rdatasetstats_dump,
3683 &dumparg, 0);
3684 }
3685
3686 fprintf(fp, "++ ADB stats ++\n");
3687 for (view = ISC_LIST_HEAD(server->viewlist);
3688 view != NULL;
3689 view = ISC_LIST_NEXT(view, link)) {
3690 if (view->adbstats == NULL)
3691 continue;
3692 if (strcmp(view->name, "_default") == 0)
3693 fprintf(fp, "[View: default]\n");
3694 else
3695 fprintf(fp, "[View: %s]\n", view->name);
3696 (void) dump_counters(view->adbstats, isc_statsformat_file, fp,
3697 NULL, adbstats_desc, dns_adbstats_max,
3698 adbstats_index, adbstat_values, 0);
3699 }
3700
3701 fprintf(fp, "++ Socket I/O Statistics ++\n");
3702 (void) dump_counters(server->sockstats, isc_statsformat_file, fp, NULL,
3703 sockstats_desc, isc_sockstatscounter_max,
3704 sockstats_index, sockstat_values, 0);
3705
3706 fprintf(fp, "++ Per Zone Query Statistics ++\n");
3707 zone = NULL;
3708 for (result = dns_zone_first(server->zonemgr, &zone);
3709 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS;
3710 next = NULL, result = dns_zone_next(zone, &next), zone = next)
3711 {
3712 isc_stats_t *zonestats = dns_zone_getrequeststats(zone);
3713 if (zonestats != NULL) {
3714 char zonename[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
3715
3716 view = dns_zone_getview(zone);
3717 if (view == NULL)
3718 continue;
3719
3720 dns_name_format(dns_zone_getorigin(zone),
3721 zonename, sizeof(zonename));
3722 fprintf(fp, "[%s", zonename);
3723 if (strcmp(view->name, "_default") != 0)
3724 fprintf(fp, " (view: %s)", view->name);
3725 fprintf(fp, "]\n");
3726
3727 (void) dump_counters(zonestats, isc_statsformat_file,
3728 fp, NULL, nsstats_desc,
3729 ns_statscounter_max,
3730 nsstats_index, nsstat_values, 0);
3731 }
3732 }
3733
3734 fprintf(fp, "++ Per Zone Glue Cache Statistics ++\n");
3735 zone = NULL;
3736 for (result = dns_zone_first(server->zonemgr, &zone);
3737 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS;
3738 next = NULL, result = dns_zone_next(zone, &next), zone = next)
3739 {
3740 isc_stats_t *gluecachestats = dns_zone_getgluecachestats(zone);
3741 if (gluecachestats != NULL) {
3742 char zonename[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
3743
3744 view = dns_zone_getview(zone);
3745 if (view == NULL)
3746 continue;
3747
3748 dns_name_format(dns_zone_getorigin(zone),
3749 zonename, sizeof(zonename));
3750 fprintf(fp, "[%s", zonename);
3751 if (strcmp(view->name, "_default") != 0)
3752 fprintf(fp, " (view: %s)", view->name);
3753 fprintf(fp, "]\n");
3754
3755 (void) dump_counters(gluecachestats,
3756 isc_statsformat_file,
3757 fp, NULL, gluecachestats_desc,
3758 dns_gluecachestatscounter_max,
3759 gluecachestats_index,
3760 gluecachestats_values, 0);
3761 }
3762 }
3763
3764 fprintf(fp, "--- Statistics Dump --- (%lu)\n", (unsigned long)now);
3765
3766 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS); /* this function currently always succeeds */
3767}
3768
